author: {'steamid': '76561197998543056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 616, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1410544957}
review:
[b] > Be me 🕵️‍♂️
> Browsing Steam for a new game to conquer my free time 🎮
> Stumble upon Altitude 🛩️
> "Hmm, looks interesting, let's give it a try" 💡
> Install.exe 💾
> Launches game 🚀
> Expecting some basic flying action 🛫
> BOOM! mind blown 💥
> Game starts with a plane doing backflips and loops like it's auditioning for a circus 🎪
> "Is this a flight simulator or an air acrobatics show?" 🤔
> Who cares, this is lit 🔥
> Start playing 🎮
> Instantly become the Chuck Norris of the skies 🤠
> Dodge missiles like I'm Neo dodging bullets 🚀
> Feel the G-force through my keyboard ⌨️
> Accidentally do a triple barrel roll while trying to land 🔄
> "Sorry, passengers, turbulence is a bit intense today" 😅
> Get wrecked a few times, but it's all good 👍
> Respawn with a smile on my face 😊
> Join a multiplayer match 🎮
> Winged warriors navigating like seasoned mages on high-velocity broomsticks 🚁
> Suddenly, I'm in the lead 🏆
> "Call me the Maverick of Altitude, baby!" 🚁
> Game is so addictive, forget to eat and sleep 🍔💤
> Start seeing planes doing stunts in my dreams 💭
> Wake up with an idea for a new trick: the inverted pancake roll 🥞
> Altitude and attitude, they say. Well, I've got both soaring higher than my kill count! 😎
> 10/10 would recommend Altitude for the ultimate adrenaline rush 🌟
> Now, excuse me while I practice my aerobatics in the kitchen with a spatula and a frying pan 🍳✈️
> Strap in, buckle up, and get ready for the ride of your life. Altitude awaits – and trust me, you don't want to keep it waiting. 🚀 [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198416760533', 'num_games_owned': 486, 'num_reviews': 431, 'playtime_forever': 1459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1459, 'last_played': 1703366877}
review:
[h1] Altitude [/h1]

[h3] Pros: [/h3] [b]✈️ Unique Aerial Combat[/b] Altitude distinguishes itself with its unique focus on aerial combat, offering fast-paced multiplayer dogfights set in colorful and dynamic environments. The game's intuitive controls and diverse aircraft options provide an exhilarating experience for players of all skill levels. 🚀🎮

[b]🌐 Active Player Community[/b] With an active and dedicated player base, Altitude ensures lively multiplayer matches and a variety of game modes to enjoy. Whether engaging in casual skirmishes or competitive tournaments, players can always find opponents to test their flying skills against, enhancing the game's replayability and longevity. 👥🌟

[h3] Cons: [/h3] [b]🛩️ Limited Single-Player Content[/b] While Altitude excels in multiplayer gameplay, its single-player content is relatively limited. Players seeking a robust solo experience may find themselves wanting more variety and depth in terms of missions and challenges. 🕹️👤

[b]🎨 Simplistic Visual Design[/b] The game's visual design, while colorful and vibrant, may appear simplistic to some players. While this minimalist approach keeps the focus on gameplay, others may prefer more detailed and immersive graphics. 🎨👀

[h3] Other Downsides: [/h3] [b]🎵 Repetitive Soundtrack[/b] Altitude's soundtrack, while energetic, can become repetitive over extended play sessions. Additional music tracks or customization options for in-game music could enhance the overall experience and prevent monotony. 🎶🔄

[b]🎮 Learning Curve for New Players[/b] Altitude has a learning curve, particularly for newcomers to aerial combat games. Mastering the controls and understanding aerial tactics may require patience and practice, potentially deterring some players from fully enjoying the game. 📈🎮

[b]Good Points[/b]
[list]
[*]Unique aerial combat gameplay.
[*]Active and dedicated player community.
[*]Colorful and dynamic environments.
[/list]
[b]Bad Points[/b]
[list]
[*]Limited single-player content.
[*]Simplistic visual design.
[*]Repetitive soundtrack.
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198018974513', 'num_games_owned': 1062, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 1985, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1985, 'last_played': 1689195605}
review: Remember when was fun following new players to all server when you are Lvl 60 and they 1, remember when kicking all those new players was hillarious, resulting in hours that they will patiently wait until the block goes off? Remember when this game was full of players? Exactly, of course not, this never happened. I don't understand how players of this crap, are always complaining that nobody plays this game anymore, when they were the same people who pushed away a lot of potential enjoyers. Dead game, boring mechanics. Tetris is better, even watching a paint get dry is better than PvP in Altitude. Remember the sexual games, disguised as innocent games, that your uncle or grandpa made you play in your childood will feel better than flying your 2D plane. This game inspired Top Gun 0/10 (☆☆☆☆☆).

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2558, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 220, 'last_played': 1682639102}
review:
[h1]KOSTENLOS[/h1]

"Altitude" ist ein kostenloser 2D-Multiplayer-Arcade-Shooter.

Mit Flugzeugen geht es in die Arenen, Team gegen Team. Es gibt einige Spielmodi. Neben den erwartbaren Klassikern auch zum Beispiel einen Fußballmodus, in dem wir einen Ball einsammeln und in ein Tor bringen müssen. 

Die Steuerung ist dabei auf den ersten Blick ungewöhnlich und irritierend. Wenn man sich aber mal an die Mechaniken gewöhnt hat, kommt man gut damit klar. 

Im Verlauf der Partien können wir uns neue Flugzeuge, Waffen und Defensivsysteme freischalten und dadurch unser Fluggerät deutlich verbessern. 

Die Grafik ist recht simpel, aber zweckmäßig. Die einzelnen Teams sind gut zu erkennen. Manchmal wünscht man sich allerdings, einen etwas größeren Bereich des Spielfeldes einsehen zu können. Die Sounds sind eher schwach, passen aber zum Arcade-Charakter des Spiels. 

"Altitude" überrascht kaum. Lediglich die Steuerung ist zunächst ungewöhnlich. Es macht aber dennoch Spaß, ein paar schnelle Partien zu zocken, vorausgesetzt man findet einen Server, auf dem sich noch Spieler tummeln, denn die Bots sind nicht die Intelligentesten. 

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
6/10 Atmosphäre
-/10 Story
6/10 Grafik
5/10 Sound
6/10 Spielmechanik
6/10 Balancing
6/10 Spielspass

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
kostenlose Multi-Flug-Ballerrei

[h1][b]6/10 Gesamtwertung

author: {'steamid': '76561197997550586', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 86400}
review:
This game saved my life.

I am 41.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

review: I bought this game for $2 and today it still remains the best $2 dollars I've ever spent on anything ever!  The game was already well on it's way on the river of styx back when I got it years ago with  only about 30 or so servers up at the time but dear god was this a fun game.  There were nights I missed going to sleep because my friends and I needed to get another game of Ball in.  Every time I see it in my library of games it brings a smile on my face as I remember the fun I had on this game.

review:

A única tristeza é que não dá vontade de ficar jogando pois o modo online é praticamente morto, basicamente só bots, raramente entra outros jogadores, se fosse mais conhecido seria bem mais divertido. Mas crédito por ainda estar funcionando certinho o modo online mesmo com poucos jogadores.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157722947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2075, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1492429519}
review:
Blast your way across the cartoon skies in this fast-paced game of aerial combat. Nimbly Games has crafted an instantly accessible, rewardingly deep, and ravishingly fun multiplayer action game. The sirens have sounded, bogies are coming in hot…
Jump into the fast and agile Loopy and drop your enemies from the sky with a tactical EMP blast - but hit your afterburners before your Biplane support tears them to pieces with 20mm cannons blazing! Barrel roll through the enemy minefield and arm your nuke as you enter the drop zone. There it is - the enemy base - but two Mirandas just warped in with lasers hot and an Explodet is lumbering into position over their hangar decks — will you carry your team to victory?
Multiplayer Done Right: Altitude combines Call-of-Duty style perks with the gameplay variety of Team Fortress 2 in a fresh multiplayer experience. Carefully refined controls, netcode, and balance make for hundreds of hours of deep, rewarding gameplay.
Seven Engaging Game Modes:
Plane Ball's constant action makes it a favorite among new and casual players while team-based tactical maneuvers like passing and blocking provide a fun challenge for veterans.
Team Base Destruction offers an intense, competitive experience where coordinated pushes and strategic loadout decisions turn the tide. Try a friendly pickup game or join a clan and play in the "Altitude ProLeague" - a competitive tournament scene run by hardcore gamers from the Starcraft and Counter-Strike communities.
For the ultimate test of dogfighting skills try 1-life Deathmatch or compete in Demolition for a more tactical, objective-based experience.
Or enjoy classic game modes like Free For All and Team Deathmatch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015382494', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 7629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7450, 'last_played': 1700697794}
review:
Before it was free, this was the first game 11 year old me bought on steam all the way back in 2008. This game really hooked me from the free trial, and it had me hooked ever since. I used to put in a few hours a week on it, but the user base started to die down. 

As far as gameplay, its the most unique indie game ive played. Cartoon planes has never been so fun. The controls are super crisp and while it took a long time to master this game, it is well worth the effort to put in the work, because you will see the fruits of your work everytime youre crowned MVP. 

I paid 10 bucks but honestly this game could be 30 bucks. Its a great game with lots of community support, probably not so much now but this game is awesome. Highly recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143559873', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 698, 'last_played': 1629534783}
review:
Planes go brrr and you can too.

It's simple controls give the game a "easy to learn but hard to master" feel, but it's not completely ridiculous.

A good game that fulfills and itches the plane warfare itch without itching too hard.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017752612', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 47158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46657, 'last_played': 1696369683}
review:
This simple plane flying game is one of my favorite and probably my 4th or 5th most played video games of all time. Playing casually is whatever, but playing ladder on a ranked Plane Ball server (like Rocket League with airships) has been one of my favorite gaming experiences. Yes, the game looks dated, is dead, and really doesn't give any incentive to play it. But the small community of people who have kept it alive and allowed me to revisit the game over the years just brings so much joy and nostalgia to my heart. 

It is easy to learn and hard to master. The mechanics of flying and shooting are supremely satisfying. The different ships/weapons are great, distinct, and balanced. If you are bored, give it a try. You can find more info about the more "competitive"/serious/fun games at www.planeball.com or in the Steam Community Hub.People gather most days of the week to play a few games and is much different than staring at a mostly blank server list.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035345202', 'num_games_owned': 1423, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1359100800}
review:
One of those "simple to learn, hard to master" gems. It's a fun game for sure. It's quite dated, now over a decade old. But it's also free. This is one of those fun games that you play once a year with the boys when you just want to relax and have some simple laughs. I would compare it to a game like Brawlhalla in that sense.

The game would be more fun if more people played it, but the community has mostly emptied out over the years. This is reflected in (as I understand it) skins for your planes no longer being acquirable.

Rating: C- (on an active, populated server)

author: {'steamid': '76561198219343843', 'num_games_owned': 16097, 'num_reviews': 311, 'playtime_forever': 581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 581, 'last_played': 1615573209}
review:
[h3][b]Altitude[/b] takes aerial dogfights, adds customizable weaponry & perks, then tops it off with a handful of modes to keep things interesting. It's quite a grind to unlock everything, however, and being built in java, has some annoyances in Windows 10, but as far as free games go, it's one of the better ones in Steam's catalog.[/h3]

[h3]Pros[/h3]
✅ Five planes, each with distinct playstyles
✅ Modular weapons, armor, and energy perks
✅ Solo & Team deathmatch, a soccer-like mode, base demolition mode
✅ Completely Free, no microtransactions

[h3]Cons[/h3]
❌ Extremely slow startup on Windows 10. See official forums for manual patching required to get it to work
❌ Can't run windowed mode without losing mouse tracking
❌ Skins are unobtainable since the currency needed to earn them has been discontinued
❌ Low player counts. There is an active community, but to get full matches requires research and planning. Most veterans play in password-protected rooms

[i]Altitude[/i] is one of those quick arcade games that's easy to pick up and play, but hard to master. You'll have to master the physics, in which your plane can stall, and carefully ration your energy between boosters and weapon fire. Each plane has a different weight, and therefore handling, to adapt to, as well as unique primary and secondary fire that serve both offensive and defensive purposes. Plane handling feels just right, slow enough to give you ample response time, but fast enough to pull of quick evasive maneuvers.

In terms of content, you can duke it out in classic deathmatch maps, or try something different with the sports-themed air ball, or team demolition modes. The latter involve carrying the ball (or payload) to the enemy side, hitting the target with a well-timed shot. There are enough maps to keep things fresh, from asteroids in outer space, to underground bunkers with narrow tunnels. Some maps are easier than others, but they make for good fun any time you're head-to-head with an opponent.

Because of the game's age, it has trouble with modern architecture. Win 10 will hang at a handshake step unless you overwrite key files in the java library, for reasons unknown. And although the game is just a bunch of 2D sprites, the loadup time can take around 2 minutes or more just to launch the game. There's considerable lag trying to switch over to the options menu (it freezes for a time), and the UI doesn't work properly with the mouse, especially towards screen corners. The keyboard Alt commands work fine, however.

[i]Altitude[/i]'s greatest weakness is its lower player population. There are full rooms, but these vary heavily by time of day. If you want to hook up with seasoned players, you'll have to make a reservation on the forums, since many of the serious games are restricted from the public. One other point worth mentioning is that if you're expecting to jump into a match with randoms, there's a big chance you'll be outgunned. Unless you grind to unlock higher level weaponry, certain planes are at a distinct disadvantage with default loadouts. Nothing that a bit of grinding wouldn't solve, though.

Compared to much of what gets thrown up on Steam daily, [i]Altitude[/i] is a real steal. Free, fun, and family-friendly, there's no reason not to give it a spin.

[u]Achievement Hunters[/u]: All achievements are tied to in-game ones, found in the hangar menu. Play all tutorial maps, then earn 4x chain, 10 kills without dying, and 50/100/150 cumulative downs with each plane. That's 300 enemies total, so it is a grind, and must be done on any multiplayer map. Host your own (complicated, check the forums), or join the XP server for a wide map and easy bots to finish solo. I believe it can be done in as little as 6 hours.

review:
[h1] Altitude [/h1] 
Altitude offers fast-paced multiplayer aerial combat with its simple yet engaging gameplay mechanics and colorful visuals. However, its limited variety of game modes and relatively small player base may lead to repetitive matches and longer queue times. Overall, it's a decent choice for casual gaming sessions, but its longevity may depend on player preferences and the availability of opponents.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134243028', 'num_games_owned': 558, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1790, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 546, 'last_played': 1683638906}
review:
I had stashed this game in my library many years ago when I first came to Steam then completely forgotten about it, until my 6 year old son dug it out from the library. He likes it so much that he's spent nine hours so far playing! If a game makes someone so happy during downlocking time you cannot but recommend it!
For someone who was there when the first computer games appeared, simple fun games are the best.

Edit: The game is built in Java, and works for almost all platforms. It can also be downloaded gratis from the makers' website, [url=https://altitudegame.com/]altitudegame.com[/url]. So one can run a server on one machine at home and host a game for other players in the household if there are several computers therein, thus circumventing the restriction imposed by Steam on running multiple instances, which is meaningless since the game is being [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/322680/BLACKHOLE/]freely distributed since 2014[/url] anyway (also the exclusion from family sharing is meaningless!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198288058950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2721, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1708864208}
review:
Данная бесплатная игра, это многопользовательский проект, сделанный вполне неплохо. Весь игровой процесс сводится к баталиям на различных серверах, в разнообразных режимах. Играете вы самолётиками, коих в игре 10 штук, но большинство из них недоступны вначале. Открываться они будут по мере прокачки левела. Каждый самолёт уникален внешне и имеет своё вооружение, отличающееся по мощности урона (ракеты, бомбы, лазеры и т.д.), к тому же, в процессе пострелушек вы можете подбирать различные бонусы, улучшающие его параметры. А повышая свой уровень, за счёт побед, естественно же, вам будут открываться апгрейды. Чем больше навык, тем проще будет побеждать. И, кстати, много достижений идут на количество побед. Если захотите их сделать, то приготовьтесь к нудному мытарству. Затянется сей процесс надолго. Хорошо, что не обязательно искать людей для этих целей. Вы можете зайти как на сервер с ботами, так и свой создать. Достижения сможете получить и таким образом.
Что ещё можно сказать об игре? Вас ждёт 7 режимов. Есть классические (дуэль, дезматч) но есть и более интересные. Один из них представляет уничтожение базы противника, это как в Batlle City (в простонародье танчики)
на NES (Денди). Только тут не просто расстрелять базу нужно, а донести до неё бомбу, на борту своего самолёта. Но не так-то просто это сделать, ибо мешать вам будут не только самолёты противника, но и турели, расставленные на вражеской территории. К тому же, противник так же стремится уничтожить вашу базу. Довольно интересный режим. Но ещё больше мне понравился другой режим, схожий с небезызвестным Rocket League. Вы, по сути, играете в футбол. Да-да, летаете самолётами, отбираете мяч у противника и отправляете его в ворота оппонента. Геймплей в данном режиме драйвовый и динамичный, карты разнообразны, и именно здесь наибольший шанс встретить живых игроков, а не ботов.
В общем, игра неоднозначна. Сначала может затянуть, но потом довольно быстро надоедает однообразным геймплеем. Людей крайне мало, а с ботами играть, сами понимаете.... Графика и музыка посредственны, т.е. вполне подходят к этому бесплатному инди-проекту. Поиграть можно, тем более, раз бесплатна, но я уверен, что надолго игра вас не затянет. Разве только, если не решитесь на выбивание ачивок, чего я вам не советую. Затянется это не на один час. Ну а, в целом, это простенькая мультиплеерная игра, ничем сильно не выделяющаяся от подобных инди-проектов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194680793', 'num_games_owned': 3031, 'num_reviews': 1947, 'playtime_forever': 1261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1233, 'last_played': 1601014148}
review:
Данная бесплатная игра, это многопользовательский проект, сделанный вполне неплохо. Весь игровой процесс сводится к баталиям на различных серверах, в разнообразных режимах. Играете вы самолётиками, коих в игре 10 штук, но большинство из них недоступны вначале. Открываться они будут по мере прокачки левела. Каждый самолёт уникален внешне и имеет своё вооружение, отличающееся по мощности урона (ракеты, бомбы, лазеры и т.д.), к тому же, в процессе пострелушек вы можете подбирать различные бонусы, улучшающие его параметры. А повышая свой уровень, за счёт побед, естественно же, вам будут открываться апгрейды. Чем больше навык, тем проще будет побеждать. И, кстати, много достижений идут на количество побед. Если захотите их сделать, то приготовьтесь к нудному мытарству. Затянется сей процесс надолго. Хорошо, что не обязательно искать людей для этих целей. Вы можете зайти как на сервер с ботами, так и свой создать. Достижения сможете получить и таким образом.
Что ещё можно сказать об игре? Вас ждёт 7 режимов. Есть классические (дуэль, дезматч) но есть и более интересные. Один из них представляет уничтожение базы противника, это как в Batlle City (в простонародье танчики)
 на NES (Денди). Только тут не просто расстрелять базу нужно, а донести до неё бомбу, на борту своего самолёта. Но не так-то просто это сделать, ибо мешать вам будут не только самолёты противника, но и турели, расставленные на вражеской территории. К тому же, противник так же стремится уничтожить вашу базу. Довольно интересный режим. Но ещё больше мне понравился другой режим,  схожий с небезызвестным  Rocket League. Вы, по сути, играете в футбол. Да-да, летаете самолётами, отбираете мяч у противника и отправляете его в ворота оппонента. Геймплей в данном режиме драйвовый и динамичный, карты разнообразны, и именно здесь наибольший шанс встретить живых игроков, а не ботов.
В общем, игра неоднозначна. Сначала может затянуть, но потом довольно быстро надоедает однообразным геймплеем. Людей крайне мало, а с ботами играть, сами понимаете.... Графика и музыка посредственны, т.е. вполне подходят к этому бесплатному инди-проекту. Поиграть можно, тем более, раз бесплатна, но я уверен, что надолго игра вас не затянет. Разве только, если не решитесь на выбивание ачивок, чего я вам не советую. Затянется это не на один час. Ну а, в целом, это простенькая мультиплеерная игра, ничем сильно не выделяющаяся от подобных инди-проектов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128089135', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2532, 'last_played': 1683489302}
review:
O jogo possui naves diferentes, cada uma com uma habilidade, vantagem e desvantagem sobre a outra. É um ótimo jogo, divertido, lembro quando jogava o modo de futebol com a sala lotada, era muito divertido. Uma pena que hoje o jogo não tem muitos jogadores, talvez em horários de pico ainda lote um servidor, mas diminuiu muito desde a ultima vez que joguei (muitos anos atrás kkkk). Se vc baixou e teve pouca gente, tente voltar em um horário bom, como a tarde, verifique a quantidade de jogadores online usando a extensão "augmented Steam", que mostra a quantidade de jogadores no momento na página da loja (só funciona no navegador).

Eu lembro que demorei pra aprender os controles, então aqui um tutorial básico: Seta pra cima ativa o turbo/teleporte (recomendo mudar esse botão nas configurações, eu uso no Q), mouse é a direção, letra S ativa a habilidade coletável, apertar a rodinha do mouse joga a bola no futebol, botão primário do mouse atira, segundo botão é a habilidade fixa do avião.
É isso, se conseguir amigos pra jogar tudo fica perfeito, ter apenas 4 (contando com vc) já é o suficiente pra se divertir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116879965', 'num_games_owned': 1283, 'num_reviews': 6886, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1577217224}
review:
Взрыв ваш путь через мультфильм небо в этой быстро развивающейся игре воздушного боя. Nimbly Games создала мгновенно доступную, невероятно глубокую и восхитительно веселую многопользовательскую экшен-игру. Зазвучали сирены, подъезжают грузовики.…
Прыгайте в быстрый и ловкий Loopy и сбросьте своих врагов с неба с помощью тактического взрыва EMP - но поразите свои Форсажи, прежде чем ваша поддержка биплана разорвет их на куски с помощью 20-миллиметровых пушек! Ствол катится по вражескому минному полю и вооружает вашу ядерную бомбу, когда вы входите в зону высадки. Вот она-вражеская база , но две Миранды только что свернулись с горячими лазерами, а над их ангарными палубами грохочет взрыватель — вы понесете свою команду к победе?
Мультиплеер сделан правильно: Altitude сочетает в себе преимущества стиля Call-of-Duty с разнообразием геймплея Team Fortress 2 в новом многопользовательском режиме. Тщательно продуманные элементы управления, сетевой код и баланс обеспечивают сотни часов глубокого и полезного геймплея.
Семь Увлекательных Игровых Режимов:
Постоянное действие Plane Ball делает его фаворитом среди новых и случайных игроков, в то время как командные тактические маневры, такие как прохождение и блокирование, обеспечивают забавную задачу для ветеранов.

вопрос тот же и остался... прошло уже 13 лет а игра ещё живая в стиме...ЭТО КАК.Игра то ни о чём ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198072266629', 'num_games_owned': 875, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1573829850}
review:
Sice si myslím že  jsem jí koupil v nějakém balíku předtím než bylo možné hru hrát zdarma ale nemůžu to říct jistě. Hra je velmi jednoduchá ale zábavná opravu se hodí pro rychlé pobavení.

+ Zajímavý a zábavný
+ Editor map
+ Možnost hostovat vlastní server
# Údajně podporuje GamePad ale zřejmě jen přes USB a jelikož se mi nechce hledat kábl nemohu ověřit ale zde je ovladač opravdu na místě.
- Sing player je spíš jako trénink kde boti i na nejvyšší obtížnost nejsou žádnou překážkou.

Jelikož hra je momentálně zdarma mohu jen doporučit i když svým rozsahem vypadá spíše jako stará flash hra ale co už no.

review:
[quote]If you would like to read more of my reviews, check out and follow the [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/27264611/] 𝓕𝓾𝓷𝓴𝔂 𝓙𝓪𝓵𝓪𝓹𝓮𝓷𝓸𝓼 curation page [/url] as well as [url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/FunkyJalapenos] joining the Steam group[/url], feel free to say Hello to the community on the Discord server! [/quote]

[h1] ▀▄▀▄▀▄ Altitude ▄▀▄▀▄▀ [/h1]

It's been some years since I played Altitude, back when they were still charging money for it and the player base was somewhat larger. In 2014, they've offered the game completely free to play, so naturally I revisited Altitude in....2019. Anyway, you play as a plane in a 2D map in usually teams or free-for-all. It was fun for what it was in 2009, now it's looking a little dated but still plays well with a controller. Of course it also supports keyboard and mouse, but see what you prefer. 

For the price of free, it's not a bad choice to play a few matches with friends and there are also bots available to fill a team if need be. This also runs on pretty much anything these days so it's good for casual players too. It was a hard sell to charge people for this game, but as free, Altitude gets a thumbs up.

review:
Easy to learn - hard to master
Отличная, милая игра про самолётики, которую мне посоветовал друг. Идёт на слабых компах, стабильно работает на медленном интернете. Быстро осваивается, приятно играется. Наверняка кто-то захочет остаться в ней надолго. Приятно к ней возвращаться время от времени. Жаль только, что людей в неё сейчас мало играет
Оценка: 9.5 самолётиков/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197985630867', 'num_games_owned': 1395, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 838, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 778, 'last_played': 1559263086}
review:
I really like this game, it's a fun game and the mechanics are really addictive. You can really play as leisurely or as active as you choose. 

But right now on the multiplayer, if you catch one of the active servers good luck hanging with everyone because it's hard to gauge your skill level versus how many things people are using at the level 60 cap. It's not impossible to hit 60 but right now if you are trying to get good at the game there are a ton of things that the level 60 people have that you don't that make you feel like you're just getting big brothered the whole time.

review: Altitude looks a lot like a Worms game, if all of the worms were moving in real time, flying airplanes, and each worm was controlled by a different player. This actually sounds like a great idea, but Altitude somehow makes it extremely boring and repetitive. Maybe if the game had a single player campaign, it would be worth a second look, but as it stands now, it is just another dead multiplayer game.

review: Controls were way too clunky & difficult to master at first, but with enough practice you can fly circles around your competition in no time. The stages are incredibly easy & planes are simply different shades of kindergarten colors. The real challenge comes in how quickly players get bored of the repeatedness. Maybe this was simply made with elementary-school-aged kids in mind?

author: {'steamid': '76561197963307637', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 1244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1528353147}
review: A fun little free game that's easy to get into but hard to master. Each plane comes with unique abilities and 3 upgradeable slots and variety of maps and modes to compete on. The menu is easy to navigate and the server browser offers advanced filtering options. I was able to find a few full servers which is surprising considering the release date. The tutorial is well done and quickly gets you game ready. The game even offers a level editor. Some game aspects could be improved such as balancing of default setups for new players and an easier transition to the multiplayer experience, perhaps including official "noob" servers limited to low level players. Ultimately, Altitude is worth a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129617771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 807, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 779, 'last_played': 1575017682}
review:
After I go through the phase of a buying on sale/refunding spree, hoping to stumble upon a gem I can sink dozens of hours into, I always find myself coming back to this. Solid arena combat, with great controls, a decent progression system and skill ceiling that is above average for this style of game--especially free. Just a solid investment of time all around, and no loss if you're not into it after the first couple hours.


Highly recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198370020840', 'num_games_owned': 162, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1021, 'last_played': 1614814754}
review:
J'aurais aimé que mon évaluation soit à la hauteur d'Altitude. M'enfin, ce n'est pas humain, la perfection. 

Aucun mot ne peut égaler l'harmonie des couleurs du design, la fluidité et le gamefeel, la simplicité déconcertante du gameplay mais l'efficace difficulté de manoeuvrage. 

Ce jeu est rapide, diversifié, éxigent, coopératif.. Je suis tombée sous le charme des IA, ni trop badass ni trop peu. 
Mais, quoi que je dise, rien ne reflète assez puissamment le délice que procure Altitude.

Ce petit jeu n'a pas de but en soit, ça peut en rebuter certain. Et pour ceux qui commprennent déjà l'utilité des ->petits<- jeux = que du bonheur!

Après.. faire fis des joueurs. ils kickent fecilement. c'est leur seul moyen d'expression et puis.. un serveur est joignable en 5 secondes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007860577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3689, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3689, 'last_played': 1399303213}
review:
A very addictive arcade-ey 2D multiplayer shooter game.

There is a variety of intesting game modes ranging from simple FFAs and Deathmatches to Football (Soccer) and Capture the Flag scenarios.

Each class of plane feels distinct from the others, have unique abilities and are all viable to some extent in different situations. 

The only issues with this game, as far as I'm concerned are the relatively small playerbase, and the tendancy for long-standing players to take an "elitist" attitude if you are new. Overall a great game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019227438', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1057, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1046, 'last_played': 1664412407}

author: {'steamid': '76561198125621444', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1655481336}
review:
Oyun bir korku oyunu değil. Aşağıdaki incelemeyi başka bir oyun için yazdığımı zannediyordum. Oyun güzel ama.







Oyunun ilk bölümü ücretsiz. Fakat beklentilerimi karşılamadı.

Jumpscare'ler gerçek bir jumpscare gibi değil, 3 boyutlu olması etkisini azaltmış.
Elimize bir eşyayı çok geç alıyoruz(ilk aldığımız eşya asıl olay olduktan sonra bir balta, o da barikatları kırmaktan başka bir işe yaramıyor.)
Bendy'nin tuzağı gereksizdi. Mürekkep üzerine düşüp hasar almayacağımızı bilmeliydi. Fakat bizi öldürmeden yakalamak gibi bir amacı varsa o başka.
Koşma hızınız da aşırı yavaş. Koşuyor musunuz yürüyor musunuz belli değil.
Onun dışında Bendy'nin hazırladığı bazı şeyler yeterince iyi.(Bir kapıyı açınca bir Bendy figürünün kayması gibi, beni korkutmuştu.)

Her bölüm için 11 11, toplam 55 tl istemesi saçma olmuş.

Kısa bir çerezlik oyun için tavsiye edilir ama çok da iyi değil.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960693835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1325923200}
review:
Bitesize Review - Altitude

The Good:
- Colourful Artstyle
- Fast Gameplay
- Different modes and planes to play with
- Easy to get into

The Bad:
- Community is small, going free did help it though
- The same things that make it easy to pick up, also make it something you may not play for too long

The Verdict:

To keep it short - this game is fun. You fly around in your 2D plane and try to score soccer goals or blow eachother up. Similar to a game like Worms, but not turn based, and with cartoon planes. It's a great game to play with friends. I recommend it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198041512403', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 2456, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1499832574}
review:
마우스로 즐기는 비행 슈팅.

사이드뷰 슈팅게임으로, 마우스의 위치를 인식하여 비행기가 이동합니다.
마우스로 공격을 하는 데, 일반(좌버튼), 아이템(휠), 보조 무기(우버튼)을 실행할 수 있죠.
또한, 상하 방향키로 속도를 조절할 수 있습니다.
현재의 조작키들이 불편하다면 설정에서 바꾸면 됩니다. 저는 속도 조절을 ws로 변경했죠.

은근 컨트롤에서 힘든 점은 엔진 조작입니다.
속도를 최하로 낮추다가 또는 어딘가에 충돌할 경우 엔진의 작동이 멈추는 경우가 있습니다.
이때 어떻게든 엔진을 작동시켜보고자 하지만, 잘 되지 않더군요.

게임은 여러 모드 중 하나를 선택하여 할 수 있습니다.
Free For All : 맵에서 그냥 난투 벌이기
Plane Balll, Snow Ball : 축구와 비슷, 공(눈)을 들고가서 상대 골대에 넣으면 됨.
Nuclear Launch Detected : 핵폭탄을 들고가서 상대 기지에 투하하여 파괴하는 것이 목표
Multiplanar Maythem : 맵에서 난투, 비어있는 벽을 통해 반대편으로 이동 가능.

거의 싱글만 플레이할 수 있다라고 보시면 됩니다.
플레이어가 보이지 않으며, 서버에 입장할 경우 bot들과 게임을 하죠.
레벨업을 하면서 비행기/ 무기/ 능력 등의 언락이 가능합니다.

아쉬운 점
-사람이 없음

review: This game was amazing back in its prime, lots of good fun days playing the soccer type mode where you have to carry and shoot a ball into a goal using powerups to block certain paths of the enemy or passing off to your teammate right before you get blown up. RIP Altitude, should make a second one and bring back the fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198295264687', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1462912016}
review:
(First, let me say I have played this more than 3 hours. I simply play on the standalone now because I wanted to be able to run my own servers more easily.)
Altitude is my go-to game when I just want something fun to do for a few minutes... or a few hours.
While deceptively simple on the surface, it can be played at a higher level through some practice, and can actually take a good deal of skill.
The community is awesome, and I feel like I get to know my team during each match. The downside is, that is only when I can find a match to play on. There are very few active players, and often only one or two servers open with players participating. When those are full, you can join a game that has one or two players on it, if there is one, but it's hard to build it up to enough players to make a fun game.
The game is great, but due to it being the style of game it is, it simply doesn't attract masses of people, as it has more of a casual feel (in my opinion), and most casual players are just that: casual. Meaning, even those who do like the game, are often only on every now and then, leaving the playing field a bit empty.
This is among my favourite free games in my steam library, so give it a try... I just wish there were more who would.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004515811', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1185, 'last_played': 1609365084}
review:
Altitude is a fun game, with a great many arenas. Despite there being only a handful of planes, they're all very dynamically unique, allowing for vastly different playstyles and tactics. Modifications allow you to further specialise your planes to suit your style. Overall, considering how simple the concept is, Altitude is surprisingly fun (especially with the 20V20 option). 

This game, while offering high quality gameplay, doesn't require much in terms of processing power. I remember running this game on my laptop from about 7 years ago (i3, onboard graphics, not much RAM). For gaming on low-end computers, it really doesn't get much better than this. Sure, there are plenty of strategy games which aren't particularly demanding (even civ5 if you don't mind running it at 10FPS), but when you want something where you shoot a bunch of dudes and when you don't want to be able to count the individual pixels or surfaces of the models, Altitude is the game.

Besides, if you don't like it you can always ask for your money back...

review: This game isn't terrible but the lack of community or anybody playing it for that matter is sad. I couldn't find a reason to keep playing but if you enjoy playing bots maybe you can. I would have to give this game a 2 out of 10, there just isnt much good to say about it and the dead community really brings the game down. I don't see this game being on Steam for much longer.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998455537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 806, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1486125210}
review:
It's a simple aerial dogfighting. You basically try to fulfill the map objective. There is a free-for-all deathmatch where you try to be the first to get 10 kills, there is a goal scoring map where you try to get your team to 6 goals, there is a bombing map where you collect a nuke to drop on your enemy's base. These are all first person shooter objectives from games like Quake and Unreal Tournament. Relative to other games on the market, it's nothing much. However, the game is simple enough that you can easily pick up the game. You accelerate and decelerate with the Up and Down keys respectively, and you point the direction with the mouse. Attack is Left Click, Launch Object is Middle Click and Special is Right Click.

Conclusion, try it but it's not a big winner.

[h1][b]PROS[/b][/h1]
1. Free
Truly free. It has no Pay To Win Mechanism. All you have to do is play enough games to level up. There is no shorcut using cash.

2. Variety of Planes
There are quite a few planes to fly so you have a small amount of replayability. Each plane also handles differently.

[h1][b]CONS[/b][/h1]
1. Boring Gameplay
It's not exactly "Oh Wow!", it's more of an "Okay"

2. Stalling
Why did you put stalling into this game? While I understand that planes can stall in real life, everything else in this game is totally unrealistic. E.g. Loop the loops for fat planes.

3. Boring Game Modes
Playing air soccer? Why? It's so boring.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972990074', 'num_games_owned': 3115, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1479692870}
review:
Ehh...didn't put much time into this because it's an almost completely dead online only game. It's an objective based multiplayer shooter with airplanes and unlockables and it used to be a paid game but now it's free. I remember playing it back in the day and enjoying it quite a bit, but unfortunately it looks like even making it completely free to play didn't do much to keep this game alive. There was some dude in there shrieking at me in Spanish though, so that's cool.

That's the problem with indie games, I guess, especially if they specifically decide to go the multiplayer only route. Unless the stars align or some twatch dude decides to latch onto it or unless it really is a stunningly good game, it's probably going to be dead within a month. It's a shame too because a lot of fun titles just kind of fall through the cracks and get lost to time. I'd classify Altitude as one of those

author: {'steamid': '76561198046436087', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1490293854}
review:
当年花 10 美元买的，一无聊发呆就拿起来玩。
这游戏已经成了我生活的一部分，可惜在线人数太少，亚洲服务器也少。

离线模式仅仅用于入门和初期练习，不到一个月 AI 就无法满足我了，必须联机，永远告别离线模式。

一共 60 级，到了 60 级可以选择 Rank Ace，你将升级自己的徽章，又从 0 级开始打。
如此往复，一共有 10 个徽章，可以 Rank Ace 9 次。
我不喜欢 Rank 10 徽章，所以停在 Rank 9 很多年了。
徽章的作用仅仅是徽章本身，纯粹的荣誉标志。

打了几年后才把官方 Wiki 几乎全部读了一遍（只有英文版本），还是有好处的，有些东西只有这里才能了解到。

一直玩的是官网的独立 exe 安装版。
最近玩了下 steam 版，发现跟官网版本有两个不同：

[list]
    [*] 官网版本是自由使用邮箱注册帐号的，steam 版自带帐号无法更改。
    [*] 官网版本自动锁 60 fps 运行，steam 版没有锁定帧率，且画面撕裂。两个版本都没有帧率和垂直同步的设定项目。
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198006103002', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 86954, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86487, 'last_played': 1641980143}
review: Altitude is a fun fast paced bullet-hell like stragetic action shooter all wrapped up into one! Don't let it's childlike graphics fool you, this game takes years to master. I love this game because of it's simplitic yet unique approach to the ever classic "Defend your goal while trying to score against the other team!" aspect. You have 5 different planes to choose from all with very different playstyles and each take time to master. You can either go at it and try to be the top killer in a Free-For-All match, or an epic Team Base Destruction game where you have to work with your team mates to drop atomic bombs onto the other team's base while protecting your own, there is certainly a lot to be said about this f2p game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198063794048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 2214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1055, 'last_played': 1514312846}
review:
Short version: It's free and furiously fun so unless you're not into planes and flying in the slightest you should try this!

Actual Review:  I'll start by simply saying this games incredibly entertaining.

Pros:
-Bug Free as far as I've found
-Nice graphics.  Yes they're 2D but they have a nice touch and are well made.
-Actual single player.  This is something many F2P games miss.  In Alt.  you can go up against bots as much as you want.
-Smooth, easy to learn gameplay.  It's simple but fast paced and exciting.  You can easily fly around without grief from physics while at the same time they take enough artistic liscense to allow Hollywood esquire  dogfight moves.
-Online play isn't absolutely caustic.  Most of the time the worst that'll happen to a new player is being told to practice offline.
-Map editor 

Cons:
-Few airplanes.  Only five are in the game.  Some more diversity would've been nice.
-Skins are no longer available.  It used to be that you could earn "Community Points" to unlock skins for planes.  However the CPs are disabled but the Skins haven't yet been released to everyone for free.

review:
This is an extremely fun game. I'm not so sure why it's free. If you like sport based games like Rocket League, or tagpro, this is for you. Seriously should be at least priced this game. Not sure why it's not.

The only thing a bit annoying is you have to grind a bit to get the different planes, (in my mind the level cap could be a bit easier to get to) but it's not that bad. Honestlly, really fun.

review:
Altitude ist ein kostenloser 2D-Arcade-Multiplayer Shoot'em Up. Man steuert ein kleines buntes Comicflugzeug auf einer recht kleinen Karte und schießt Spieler vom anderem Team ab oder im Spielmodus mit Fussball einen Ball ins Tor. Besonders gut finde ich den Modus mit Basis ausbomben des Gegnerteams. Das Spiel ist recht unterhaltsam für zwischendurch. Allerdings fehlt es mittlerweile etwas an Mitspieler.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tvlj7fAggbk

author: {'steamid': '76561198012937018', 'num_games_owned': 284, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 522, 'last_played': 1473175055}
review:
Angriest review of all time time.

It's not often that I rate down because of a community (c'mon look at my tf2 playtime) but holy shit.


The shit you will have to put up with in Altitude 2016:

Only one or two populated servers at a time

Both play a garbage afterthought gamemode played on the same shit map that has no walls in it, all balance thrown out of the window

Everyone teamstacking.

If the one populated server gets filled, they will rather kick you than try to populate the other 50, even if some of them might be running a sane gamemode for a change.

Everyone giving you shit for not having a high level and killing them, especially if you do so with a "noob plane" that would be balanced on a proper map.



This game is like if TF2 playerbase got nuked and the last remaining populace was allcrit cp_orange players. This game is a postapocalyptic wasteland with nothing to see but garbage.

Run away, Simba.

review: Altitude is a fun little game! It's an arcade style, multiplayer game focused on different types of aircraft, from the humble biplane to advanced alien type planes. It's light, has some surprisingly fun and tense play, and a good way to kill some time. I don't think it's super deep, but the developers put in enough tools for tactical plays to be a thing. Features deathmatch and base bombing, among other modes. Recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074152225', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1476471668}
review:
So, I played the tutorial and LOVED the gameplay! Then I decided to join a game.

From what I've heard from other people, other players are rude and they kick new people out for good people.
Here's what happened to me:

-Went to game list

-Dissapointed by lack of players

-Joined the only online server, football

-Got my first goal

-Nobody was being rude so far..?

-Nobody was competitive

-Everybody was passing, SWEEEET!

-Lost my first game :(

-Every single player was saying GG in chat!

So not every player is rude, you just got to find the right people.

8.5/10 Basicly rocket league with planes. Except...Different.? GREAT for a free game aswell!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198047280055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1468408021}
review:
В принципе игра отличная. Но есть минус, о котором никто не говорит в своих обзорах. Поэтому скажу я:
ЛЮДЕЙ НА СЕРВЕРАХ НЕТ.
Есть два сервера - один, который забит 14 человеками, играющими целыми днями в деpьмoвый футбольный режим. И второй, где всего пять человек, а то и меньше.
Отсюда следует, что смысла играть в эту хорошую игру - нет никакого.
Но игра хорошая-хорошая. :*
-----------------------
Basically, the game is excellent. But there is a minus that no one says in their reviews. Therefore, I say:
PEOPLE THE SERVER DOES NOT.
There are two servers - one that scored 14 people playing all day in a crappy football mode. And second, where only five people, or even less.
It follows that the meaning of this play a good game - no.
But the game is good, good. *

review:
Altitude is a free to play 2D flying combat PVP game.  It worked, looked ok, played ok, sounded ok.  Has some quick Steam achievements in the  tutorial, has bots in skirmish games.  It was sold, now Free to Play.  Has plenty of populated servers with different maps.  Try it, you  might like it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964528634', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 866, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 866, 'last_played': 1353139200}
review:
Un must pour se défouler entre amis !
Il faut quelques parties pour bien comprendre les principes de base mais une fois passé ce cap c'est un vrai plaisir.

Les différents modèles d'avions offrent différents styles de jeu qu'il vous faudra mêler avec ingéniosité pour mettre la misère à vos potes de l'équipe d'en-face.

Et pour les plus débrouillards, il est possible de créer ses propres cartes !

author: {'steamid': '76561198072858754', 'num_games_owned': 160, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1468155318}
review:
Взрыв свой путь через мультипликационных небо в этом быстрый темп игры воздушного боя. Проворно Games выстроил в мгновенно доступный, rewardingly глубокий и восхитительно забавная игра мультиплеер действий. Сирены прозвучали, тележками приходят в горячий ... 
 Перейти в быстрой и гибкой невменяемым и падение ваших врагов с неба с тактическим EMP взрыва - но удар ваши afteburners, прежде чем ваша поддержка Биплан разрывает их на куски с 20мм пушками пылающий! Бочка через минное поле противника и вооружить вашу ядерную бомбу, как вы входите в зону падения. Там он - враг база - но два копиии только деформированные с использованием лазеров горячими и Explodet является лесопиление в положение над их ангар палубы - вы нести свою команду к победе 
 Мультиплеер Готово Справа: Высота над уровнем моря сочетает в себе Call-о-Duty перки стиле с разнообразием геймплея Team Fortress 2 в свежем многопользовательские experience.Carefully рафинированных управления, сетевой код, и баланс, чтобы сделать сотни часов глубокого, насыщенного геймплея 
 Семь Привлечение Режимы игры: 
 постоянное действие Плоскость Болла делает его фаворитом среди новых и случайных игроков в то время как командные тактические маневры, как прохождение и блокирование обеспечивают интересный вызов для ветеранов.
 Team Base Destruction предлагает интенсивный, конкурентный опыт, где скоординированные толчки и стратегические решения Loadout Переверните tide.Try товарищеский матч пикап или вступить в клан и играть в "Altitude Proleague" - конкурентоспособный турнир сцены в ведении хардкорных геймеров из в Starcraft и Counter-Strike сообщества.
 Для окончательного теста собачьим боям навыков попробовать 1-жизнь Deathmatch или Demolition конкурировать на более тактической, объективной основе опыта.
 Или попробовать классические режимы игры, как Free For All и Team Deathmatch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276369501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1466910613}
review: Esse é um bom joguinho para testar a plataforma, por ser gratuito. Possui compatibilidade com controle, funciona online, possui conquistas e é multiplataforma. A mecânica e a ideia do jogo até que é boa, o controle responde bem até, mas depois que você faz os treinamentos e esta livre para jogar online, vem a parte ruim do jogo: Ninguém joga. Se tiver 20 pessoas online jogando já é muito e isso perde todo o propósito do game. O formato de futebol é o mais gostoso de jogar, mesmo contra bots. É um bom jogo para começar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121525707', 'num_games_owned': 576, 'num_reviews': 211, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1463805975}
review:
Chill casual game. You take the control of the aircraft and fight against other aircraft (whenether those are AI or other players).

Pros:
- requirements for this game are really low, you can run it on wooden computers
- easy to learn and get into, also kids' friendly
- different types of planes, with adjustable skills
- there are custom mods for servers
- there are still players playing this game even after 7 years
- there are also single player training missions and custom offline games with bots

Neutral:
- servers are privately hosted

Cons:
- community is toxic
- developers abandoned it
- you cant get skins for airplanes anymore
- very repetitive and boring, nothing to unlock (except few levels at start which only unlock new airplanes)
- there are only some minor stats about player's performance with each plane

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198011427235', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 585, 'last_played': 1697095422}
review:
9/10

Lots of nostalgia tied to this one, so it was heartbreaking to see that SteamDB indicated a measly five people have played this in the past 24 hours. Released in 2008 or 2009, still full of people when I played most in 2016, and now forgotten about. An utter shame for something as timeless as this.

Despite the lack of players, it's still a fantastic little gem that I would wholeheartedly recommend. Numerous servers are still up, you have capable bots to play against, and the gameplay is just casually addicting with how fun and light it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962882733', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 864, 'last_played': 1459604918}
review: A multiplayer flying game. Team-based, class-based, casual aerial combat. It's strength is its simple yet very functional and interesting flight mechanics. The maps and modes are diverse enough. Graphics feel a bit dated and bland. Not many players still around but I found a few full servers today when I write this. Since it's now free to play, there's no reason not to try it.

review:
At first glance this game is remarkably simple. Like Tetris however, this game is wonderfully deep. Fast-paced multiplayer action + free to play + can be played with one hand = great game. Ultimately, I moved on from this game quickly, because it is simple and I have too many other games to play! Would definitely recommend!

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198129129759', 'num_games_owned': 936, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1454435394}
review:
Altitude est un petit jeu de combat aérien en 2d plutôt fun!
Le jeu est vraiment sympathique, de part la possibilité de jouer seul ou a plusieurs en ligne et les différents modes de jeu ainsi que le système de level-up permettant de débloquer de nouveaux engins et de nouvelles habiletés qui diversifient le gameplay et font en sorte que l’on ne s’ennuie pas.
Je vous conseille donc Altitude. De plus, vous n’avez aucune excuse car le jeu est gratuit 😉

author: {'steamid': '76561197998350505', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 27988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23677, 'last_played': 1694382223}
review:
Standard shooter: hold 'W' until you find an enemy, point and click, repeat.

Altitude at first: Obstacle course!

Altitude later on: Varied fights with constant maneuvering. The layout of the area and the speed, position and angle you have relative to your enemy when you encounter them all affect how the battle plays out.



Some beginners tips:

The most popular map, "Football", has no obstacles so is easy for beginners.

The bots who sometimes fill out teams on public servers are mostly on difficult settings with perfect aim, and can give even experienced players trouble. Their main weakness is that they will focus completely on whatever target or objective they have at the moment, ignoring other enemies unless you go straight in front of them.

When on a server, press TAB and look at the player's levels next to their badges. If there's no number, they're level 60. Sometimes a level 60 will start over from level 1, for prestige, but you can tell them apart by their more complex badges vs a beginners cartoony blue and yellow ones.

Anyway, level 60 people are usually pretty good. Sometimes I don't even fire at low level guys, just circle around them dodging their shots, and they often crash before managing to kill me :) The game has a high skill-ceiling. So you might want to find a server with beginners, the servers with just a few players on them often are.

Now, get online and try to hit me :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198155164093', 'num_games_owned': 209, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 942, 'last_played': 1595117124}
review:
Ei, você. Sim, você! Está a procura de um jogo grátis e divertido, além de rodar em qualquer pc? Este é o jogo pra você.
Altitude é um jogo bem divertido e tem vários modos de jogo, além de ter level editor para aumentar a diversão!
Modos de jogo:
free for all: mata-mata todo mundo contra
team-deathmatch: mata-mata em equipe
ball: é tipo um rocket league, só que ultilizamos aviões
1lifedm: mata-mata em equipe com uma vida
tbd: team base destruction, em que 2 equipes devem destruir a base da outra com Nuke bombs que aparecem no mapa
1lifedemolition: é básicamente CS no altitude
1lifebasedestruction: tbd com uma vida


Pode não ter o Server launcher, mas so ir no site e baixar o altitude no-steam, que lá você irá ter-lo.
A minha nota sobre esse jogo é.......
AWESOME, brincadeira. Minha nota é:
Legal

author: {'steamid': '76561198106849741', 'num_games_owned': 493, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1457, 'last_played': 1411393259}
review:
I wrote a review over a year ago and deleted it because of the backlash from the community. Decided to write it again to inform people about a few things.

The game has two big problems:

1. Lack of new players

Most of the servers are empty. The game is dead.

2. The attitude towards new players

Just check out these pictures for example

http://i.imgur.com/ychx5XT.png
http://i.imgur.com/PQQpeZj.png

You guys NEED new players to keep the game alive. And you just keep pushing them away. You're killing your own community.

I played the game for a few hours and had fun. Until I got into an argument with some "old veteran" who liked to votekick noobs from the server to make room for his friends to join. I got votekicked and couldn't play on that server anymore. There were not many servers to play on. Maybe 2 or 3. I didn't touch the game since.

There are some people who are nice to new players but if the majority of the community are self-centered elitists, the game is going to die. It already has died.

review:
Pros:

Fairly good servers.

You can rank up fast by fighting bots.

great way to spend time.

Easy to learn.

I tried it on my 15 year old labtop and it still got a solid 60 FPS.

No lag spikes even during the craziest fights

Cons:

Hard to fight high level planes.

Can get boring after around a hour.

Over all its a great game good graphics without needing even a Duo processor. I will probobly play for an hour or so each day.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115158556', 'num_games_owned': 1402, 'num_reviews': 392, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1558812658}
review:
8.7/10 - Really fun Multiplayer Plane game

I really love this game. There is both single player and muliplayer. The solo missions are basically prep for multiplayer. Although you can play multiplayer at any level, it's best if you level up your plane to -level 21-. At this point you have an awesome ship that most players use. (It teleports and takes a beating.)

Since there are only around 50-100 people playing online at a time, you will play against all skill levels and planes. This means it's really wise to play the campaign fully before jumping into multiplayer.

Worth $10

author: {'steamid': '76561197969068244', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 108258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37271, 'last_played': 1703052128}
review:
I've played this on and of since 2010 - other games come and go, but I keep coming back to this. It has the most hours on my account for good reason. 

Very well balanced with lots of variety in planes, maps (plus a map editor) and game styles / objectives.

A small but active (and awesome) community.

... And now is free!

author: {'steamid': '76561198179523627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 626, 'last_played': 1549114457}
review:
Wow. I was surprised by this game. I knew would be fun for a couple of rounds, but I didn't think I would go back to it.
If your familiar with Free to play games like teeworlds or Luftrauser. Then this game will be easy to identify. 

Pros:
-Map Creator
-Good communtiy
-Good Customiztion for each plane
-Cleaver multiplayer Modes
-Nice Mechanics 

Cons:
-Very few servers have people playing on them.
-The Community isn't nice. Best to turn off chat.
-The engine stalling mechanic, can get annoying every once in awhile.
-Skins have been Discontinued.

Overall it's really fun. If you like dogfighting games. Definitely check this one out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045820895', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1419269813}
review: Altitude is quite a fun game, considering all of the game modes and Steam Achievements! It's casual, but also could be played competitively if someone wanted to put in the effort to get uncommonly good at it. The graphics are decent-looking enough, and most- if not all- semi-modern PCs should have no trouble running this game. Heck, it's free! The only issue I could see is the fact that I believe the community is more or less dead, but you can play against bots of different levels of difficulty if you enjoyed the gameplay enough. Give Altitude a try!

review:
Why is it that, when playing with an Xbox controller, flying from left to right down is up but from right to left down is down?
It exactly the same problem the mid 90's Amiga CD32 game "Jetstrike" had. That was the mid 90's though! A decent concept let down by shonky controls.

review:
Графика игры хорошая для того сколько эта игра хочет.
Геймплей устраивает а возможность создовать собственные карты делает игру более интересной.
Различные режимы игры дают игроку развлечся.
Есть большой выбор снаряжение но всё сбалансировано так что на игру это сильно не влияет.
В общем игра отличная.

review:
I can't reccomend this to much anyone. Higher level planes crush lower level planes, there's no balance between them. You have to live in Europe to get into an active server with reasonable ping. Connection's laggy at best, even if it's all bots and just you. There's few players anyways.

"I r8 8/88." ~"Ping limits suck."

author: {'steamid': '76561198106645651', 'num_games_owned': 401, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1448755786}
review:
HOOOOOOOOLLLLLLLLLLLLYYYYYYYYYYYYY CRAP where do I begin...

Pros:
?

Cons:
You have to play for at least 5 hours to even get anything worth playing with
Game is unbalanced, new players have no chance at all when it puts you on teams based on skill. By that I mean all the pros on one team and new players on another.
In order to even PLAY the game you need to know basic linux commands to access and join servers. WHAT THE HELL.
Controls aren't explained AT ALL.
Game mechanics aren't explained AT ALL.
Every server is full of people who spam the lenny face and talk about how "Hitler was a good guy"

What else can I even say, at least its a free game so you don't waste money on this shit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139563955', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 1320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1293, 'last_played': 1447259294}
review:
Altitude es un juego que goza de muchísimos modos de juego, lo cual hace que al menos, para mí, sea un goloso F2P que merece la pena de probar. Además, es un juego que sirve perfectamente como entrenamiento para otros juegos del género, tal y como cual puedes leer en el resto de los análisis.

Nos da una amplia flota de aviones ( Aúnque en mi opinion la mayoría de ellos son inútiles de por sí solos ) para completar estos muchos desafíos.

Es un juego apto para toda la familia, y si tienes un mando de XBox 360 o alguno generico de pc puedes jugar localmente con más de un jugador en un pc.

Todo lo dicho y más por decir. Lo recomiendo.

review: Actualmente tiene pocos servidores online, pero es un juego bastante adictivo y requiere ciertas mecánicas para poder lograr ser el mejor jugador de la partida, tiene perks para mejorar los aviones y permite la rejugabilidad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028635556', 'num_games_owned': 1079, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1445026795}
review:
Really simple Free to Play game. It's still got people playing which means it's still a good game. Mechanics are good and the different planes are interesting with their different guns and abilities. 

If you want to install a fun little game when funds are tight this game could be appealing for a couple hours. 

It's a fun little multiplayer game and is pretty great.

review:
EEEEEEENORME

Tout joueur curieux qui se respecte se doit d'essayer cette petite merveille !

Tourne sur n'importe quoi, une maniabilité très satisfaisante, passe très rapidement le temps, possibilité de s'entrainer contre des bots, des modes de jeux originaux, et surtout...

IL EST GRATUIT !

Un jeu comme ça pourrait coûter 5€ si on lui aujoutait un p'tit solo vite fait

Le seul défaut, c'est que faut télécharger un truc pour héberger ses propres serveurs

Un des jeux les plus rafraichissants que j'ai connu !

author: {'steamid': '76561198090865103', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1455145869}
review:
В Altitude есть разные виды самолётов (классы), их всего 5, каждые классы со своей тактикой.
Также тут есть уровни, убил несколько вражеских самолётов или выполнил какие-нибудь действия на благо своей команды, получи lvl up. С каждым уровнем открываются новые самолёты или перки к ним (улучшение брони, выбор оружия и т.д.).

 Сама игра не требует мастерства пилотажа, достаточно иметь руки и нормальную мышку с клавиатурой, ведь это не симулятор, а всего лишь инди-экшен. 

 Игрушка может затянуть не на один вечер. Оценка игры: 6.5/10 , просто это аркада, и может быстро под конец надоесть. И на этом всё.

author: {'steamid': '76561198215574435', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1441642449}

author: {'steamid': '76561198044078952', 'num_games_owned': 911, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 3960, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3948, 'last_played': 1442788584}
review:
I may not be a grizzled veteran with thousands of hours, but I've definitely been around. I can easily say this is one of my top 5 favorite games, but, it does come with ample warning -- it is most definitely not for everybody. Let me explain... (TL;DR version at the bottom of the post)

Currently, the largest issue is the lack of new players. Within a week, you can usually catch about 50 or so veterans at least once (many every day). However, it is becoming rarer each day to find new players. This means that unless you're playing with bots, you'll probably have a hard time.

I'd suggest getting a few friends and hosting a server of your own in order to get decent at the game before hopping onto, for instance, ball dojo (the "top tier" open server). Who knows, you might become good enough to join a permanent team or recieve an invite to ranked. The hardest part of this game is most definitely the initial push to be able to compete with the big dogs of Altitude, and after that, it's always extremely fun (and many times equally frustrating) to play.

I do not claim to be an extremely great player. Sometimes, I can get a goal. On a great day, sometimes 3. However, much of the veteran community is much better than I am and sometimes it [i]really[/i] shows. I only bring this up to say that even when your team is losing and you're one of the last players on it (maybe because you accidentally passed to an enemy that zipped past you to score), it is still a very fun game.

Worst case scenario, you just wasted... 0.00 dollars/pounds/euros/colourful rocks. If not for anything but for the sake of the community, give the game a shot. It is very friendly and close, since most people know of eachother (and if not, somebody else that knows who they do not). Many people are willing to help teach you and give you pointers.

Oh yeah, and gameplay. The steering is tight (mouse+keyboard at least), there are literally 5 controls if you use mouse+keyboard (3 on the mouse, up and down on the keyboard), you rank up in order to unlock new planes then new parts for said plane, there is a prestige system in order to get a better graphical rank, and there are [b]absolutely no in-game purchases with real money[/b]. That alone is extremely rare for a free-to-play multiplayer game, and for these many reasons, I cannot recommend this game enough.

[b]TL;DR[/b]

It will be a very difficult game at first, but after getting used to it (no more than a week at most, really), you will wonder how you've never played this game before. Not a huge community, but it's hard to tell since there's always at least 2 viable servers. NO in-game real cash payments. Tight controls and gameplay that doesn't feel repetitive. And, it's completely free -- there's no reason it's not worth trying.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970078168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 460, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1440612757}
review:
Recommended.
One of those little games full of fun. Casual and highly addictive.
Simple controls, simple rules, no deep story, no hi-tech graphics, just a bag of fun in a little flash.
It remembers me those early arcade games that started all this stuff (where playability was the goal) but, with a fresher look.
Cute, frenzy, simple to understand, simple to play, difficult to master.
Online Multiplayer with friends or against any other players makes the gaming experience even funnier.
Different playing modes. Each one funny enough.
Quick matches so, very addecuated for when you just have those 15 mins to play (well, it's so addictive that maybe...)
A little shinny pearl.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984658005', 'num_games_owned': 618, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 972, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 960, 'last_played': 1439218484}
review:
Das erste Spiel, das ich wirklich intensiv auf Steam gespielt habe - zumindest wenn es Free Weekends gab. Es macht auch Jahre später noch einen großen Spaß mit den verschiedenen Flugzeugen und ihren Fähigkeiten Ballspiele zu meistern.

Die einfache Optik erlaubt auch Gelegenheitsspielern mit einem schwächeren PC kurzweilige Action zu erleben. Ich hatte zumindest auf meiner Workstation mit Quadro 2000 keine Probleme, obwohl die Karte keine Treiberoptimierung besitzt, wie z.B. eine GTX. Auch unter Windows 10 Pro habe ich keine Probleme feststellen können.

Im Grunde ein Spiel mit Tiefgang und einem unwiederstehlichen Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146182361', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1448762507}
review:
Внешне Altitude похожа на одну из игр, которые наперебой предлагают скачать продавцы контента для мобильных телефонов. Однако игра была выпущена на компьютер, и я могу вам сказать, что это достойный 2D симулятор самолетиков. 

Базовую механику игры можно освоить секунд за двадцать: шумная эскадрилья самолетов носится по уровням, живо напоминающим локации из серии Worms. Единственное отличие локаций Altitude от локаций Worms так это разрушаемость. В Altitude вы не сможете разрушить никакой из объектов, кроме базы соперника, но об этом позже.
 
Управление осуществляется с помощью мыши и клавиатуры или геймпада. Клавиши со стрелками отвечают за подачу. Еще три кнопки отведены под соответствующие виды оружия. 

Первая особенность: целиться мышью нельзя! Стрелять можно только в том направлении, куда смотрит нос самолета, другими словами, врагу необходимо или сесть на хвост, или встретиться с ним лицом к лицу. 

Вторая особенность: физика. Для всех видов самолетов действует одно базовое правило – останавливаться нельзя. Потерявший скорость корабль быстро опускается на «дно» карты, где рано или поздно насмерть разбивается о камни. Чтобы выйти из штопора, можно включить ускорители, но для их работы используется то же топливо которое расходуется при стрельбе, так что приходится выбирать между огневым потенциалом и скоростью.

Altitude имеет несколько режимов:

1. Free for all

Этакий deathmatch для самолетов где каждый играет сам за себя. Побеждает тот, кто быстрее всех сделает 10 убийств.

2. Multiplanar Mayhem

Этот режим полностью совпадает с предыдущим режимов, но есть единственное отличие. Здесь нужно совершить 20 убийств.

Режимы перечисленные выше встречаются и в командных вариантах, где группе самолетов нужно набрать определенное количество убийств быстрее, чем соперники.

3. Plane ball

Это своеобразный футбол. Вашей команде нужно отправить мяч в ворота противника. Выигрывает так команда, которая быстрее наберет 6 очков.

4. Snow ball

Режим полностью схожий с предыдущим. Отличие одно и единственное – это зимняя тематика

5. Nuclear Launch Detected

Этот режим чем-то напоминает карту из Dota 2. Здесь также есть «вышки» и база. Вы спросите меня как уничтожить эту базу, а я вам расскажу. В самом центре карты появляется одна бомба, которую вы можете сбросить на базу противника. Также существует другой вариант этого режима. В нем дается две бомбы, то есть одна на команду.

Как и любая современная инди-игра, Altitude выглядит весело и дешево, но мигом затягивает всех, кто осмеливается ее запустить. Вряд ли Altitude надолго затянет тех, кто уже по уши завяз в Team Fortress 2 и Left 4 Dead 2, но если вам внезапно захотелось поиграть с кем-нибудь в мультиплеере и при этом не хочется терять время на вникание в процесс – лучше игры не найти.

Оценка 10/10
