author: {'steamid': '76561198056718792', 'num_games_owned': 221, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1352, 'last_played': 1542330678}
review:
Игра затягивает. Разнообразие лётных аппаратов и вооружения, а так-же их модификаций очень радует и гарантирует, что игра вам не скоро наскучит. В общем, меня затянуло, играл долго, потом забросил, недавно опять попробовал, но теперь много игроков, которые умеют действительно хорошо играть, так-что в мультиплеере для меня как-то сложно, особенно после длинной паузы. А в целом, игра - класс. Есть всё, что надо, для счастья, так сказать. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Единственное, что очень огорчает - тот факт, что многие (в том числе и я) платили за игру, а теперь она стала беслпатной. Обидно получается.. Но игра хуже от этого не становится.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210997964', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1432042280}
review:
Данная игра мне очень понравилась.
После краткого и достаточно интересного обучения, которое вполне ознакомило меня с игрой я приступил к игре в мультиплеере. Играть против реальных людей без сомнения намного хоть и сложней, но в тот же момент и интересней. Особенно когда игра происходит на самолётах которым легко можно управлять использую либо мышь и клавиатуру, либо только клавиатуру. Со временем зарабатывая опыт и открывая новые самолёты, вы и станете профессионалом. Количество вашего же опыта поможет оценить ваш скилл в игре и для многих это достаточно весомо. Как же можно не оставить положительный отзыв о данной игре, хотя и не глубокой со смыслом, но со своей изюминкой.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054680238', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 782, 'last_played': 1615499468}
review:
Short review:
You can play football in planes. (Admittedly with some pretty nasty tackles.) How freaking awesome is that?

Longer review:
While it may have a pretty small playerbase (at times <50 people online), most of the rooms are open, and overall it's pretty fun to play.
You need a surprising amount of skill with any of the five planes available to take down enemies without stalling and crashing into the ground.
You need to learn careful energy management so that, once you do have someone in your sights, you don't have to wait to be able to start firing.
You also need to learn how to avoid being ambushed while doing this, and how not to smash into a wall and die an embarrassing (and ignoble) death.

Really, you just have to try it. It's better than the screenshots make it look.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014926595', 'num_games_owned': 775, 'num_reviews': 967, 'playtime_forever': 2186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1940, 'last_played': 1433707772}
review:
Normally, this is where I'd put a joke review before the real review......eh screw it, I'll do it here too!!!


Joke Review:  WELCOME TO THE 9/11 SIMULATOR!!!


Real Review:  It's not a bad title.  It's a nice casual game about planes shooting each other down.

Modes include Free For All (Death Match), single life team death match, Ball (Football/soccer/hockey), and Team Base Destruction.


Not only is this a free game, but it has achievments too (If you're an achievement junkie).  So really, you're not losing anything.


The only real criticism I have is that the community is pretty much toast.  Though you'll find life in about 3-6 servers.  The rest are simply filled with bots.   So, you could say it has more life than Gun Monkeys.


Good game for casuals, though a little skill will be involved....so I guess hardcore gamers might like this title too.  Just don't expect it to be a stellar, award-winning title.



7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198194867326', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1076, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 939, 'last_played': 1523475387}
review:
Ever played MiniSquadron on iOs or Android? This is it's version under steroids.

Fast paced, airplane action multiplayer.
The multiplayer allows hours and hours of fun, in game types such as team deathmatch, dodgeball and football. 
A lot of people are complaining about the community, personally i still haven't had an argument or any kind of problem while playing. As long as you play fairly and don't completely fuck it up, you'll be fine.

WARNING: EXTREMELY ADDICTIVE / EXTREMELY RECOMMENDED
also, it has a quite steep learning curve. At first you'll get REKT. A lot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014163253', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 388, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1421534339}
review:
[b][u]-Quick Review-[/u][/b]
Altitude is 2D-Indie-"flight simulator" developed in 2009 by Nimbly Games, the game implements different playable craft, different game modes, and fairly basic controls. [i](up, down, throttle down, throttle up, pew A, Pew B)[/i]

 [b][u]-Detailed breakdown review-[/u][/b]
 [b]Story:[/b]  There isn't really a story, this game is basically a 2D-indie-MOBA.

 [b]Game Play:[/b] As I said earlier, the controls are very simple, but it does take into account gravity, firing arc, and several other aspects that makes the strategies far more complex. For example, if you're flying higher than your opponent/target, you can dip lower and fly faster because of descending altitude (puns, ha!).
Unfortunately because Altitude is a MOBA, the game relies heavily upon other players. [i](This is the key downside to the game for achievement hunters; or people who want to unlock new aircraft)[/i] There are usually a few servers that are up with people playing, but for the most part the community has been shrunk down to a nearly-non-existent-size.

 [b]Achievements:[/b] There are three achievement categories: 1) Get tons of kills with this plane without death, 2) Get tons of kills overall 3) Do this training mission. Many of the planes you need for achievements aren't unlocked until you rank higher, adding to the difficulty of getting the achievements, with the prerequisite of "ranking up first". [i]With less words: It'll take a lot of time, and unless you're playing with friends the achievements are a skip.[/i]

 [b]Price:[/b] Altitude is Free to Play, so there's not much excuse to not trying it... Unless you're a normal steam gamer, and have hundreds or millions of games in your steam library... in that case... yes, that's a good excuse. But if you're cursed by financial limitations like the person writing this review, then free games are nice! :P

 [b]Conclusion:[/b] Since the game is free... you are probably only looking through the reviews to see funny comments. There's a good chance you won't even see this one; since there are those crazy guys who have 500-1,000+hours in the game who reviewed it when the community was still strong.
Still, I enjoyed playing it, and it deserves to be recognized as a fun indie game. This game will appeal to most people who enjoy other Indie games, but the people who enjoy MOBA's and flight mechanics will get the biggest kick out of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117473099', 'num_games_owned': 364, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1067, 'last_played': 1637783177}
review:
+ Muchos modos de juego:
||       ++ FÚTBOL.
||       + Destrucción de base, y su versión sin respawns.
||       + Los otros muchos modos de juego.
||       + Co-Op, que no es un modo de juego en sí, sino un tipo de mapa no oficial en el que tienes que ir siguiendo la ruta dada por el mapa mientras vas matando torretas con los demás jugadores hasta llegar a la meta. Los servers con mapas de co-op suelen estar vacíos, pero si pillas uno con 3 o 4 personas puedes pasar un muy buen rato destrozando torretas y muriendo 300 veces hasta que te pasas el mapa. [b][u]Literalmente[/u][/b].
+ Se requiere una cierta habilidad para jugar competitivamente, y es casi imprescindible pillarle el truco a todas las clases y configuraciones.
+ Los bots no se suelen andar con chiquitas y están bien equilibrados con respecto a los niveles de dificultad, lo cual es algo que falla muchísimo en los juegos competitivos de ahora.
+ Las especificaciones mínimas son bajísimas, tan bajas que casi seguramente el juego correría bien en un Raspberry Pi(de segunda generación, si, pero correría).
+ Gráficos decentes que no sangran los ojos. Punto. No es que haya mucha gente que quiera gráficos AAA en un juego competitivo que además es 2D...
+ Editor de mapas. Un poco complicado de usar quizá, pero hace su trabajo muy bien.
+ La configuración de servidores es muy customizable.

- Los servers en general suelen estar vacíos.
- Nimbly Games ha dejado de actualizar el juego tras ponerlo como un F2P, lo cual es una pena para un juego que tiene tanto potencial.

Este juego necesita más atención. 97/100

author: {'steamid': '76561198206896976', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 69767, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23917, 'last_played': 1603410925}
review:
Ótimo jogo!
É um jogo simples com uma jogabilidade fácil. Se torna viciante!

- FASES:
São inúmeras fases, que inclusive até hoje entro em salas que nunca joguei antes, mesmo com 400h de game. 

- AVIÕES:
Vários modelos de aviões, cada um com sua exclusividade. Arma primária e secundária. Você vai desbloqueando diversos tipos de aviões e escolhe o que mais se identifica.

- MODALIDADES
Existem diversos tipos de modalidades, tais como: 
* Destruição de Base: onde você deve levar a bomba, passando pelo time adversário e lançar na base inimiga.
* Futebol: cujo objetivo é fazer o maior número de gols durante o período da partida que pode variar de 10 ou 20 minutos, ou até mesmo trocar de mapa (fase) ao atingir 6 gols.
* PVP: cada player joga individualmente e quem fizer o maior número de kill (matar) até o tempo final é o vencedor. Os aviões são identificados por cores, onde cada cor representa um player.

A interface é bem simples e deixa algumas dúvidas, como por exemplo: como criar um server, ou adquirir pontos para comprar skin. Nesse ponto poderia melhorar bastante.

Aguardo por novas atualizações! Talvez com melhoria de gráfico e mais facilidade de acesso à informações.
Recomendo o game!

review: This game is awesome.  Its simple, you destroy other planes on the enemy side.  The controls are ok in my opinoin, but there is a lot of freedom in changing them. author: {'steamid': '76561198081448484', 'num_games_owned': 625, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1431175198}
review:
Altitude ist ein einfach gehaltenes 2D-Flugzeug-Kampfspiel, in dem es verschiedene Spielmodi wie Team-Deathmatch, Free for All, Gegnerbasis bombardieren oder eine Art Fußball gibt. Es macht eigentlich wirklich viel Spaß.

[h1]Pro[/h1]
-Grafik sieht gut aus
-Musik passt
-Sound ist gut
-Sehr gute Steuerung
-Kostenlos
-Einsteigerfreundlich
-Einzelspieler und Mehrspieler vorhanden
-Benutzererstellte Karten (Karteneditor)
-Jede Klasse spielt sich anders
-Jeder Spielmodus spielt sich anders

[h1]Contra[/h1]
-Nicht viele Mehrspielerserver mit Spielern vorhanden, meistens haben nur 3 bis 4 Server gerade Spieler online
-Es kann nervig sein, wenn man manchmal in einem Spiel mit absouluten Pro's spielt

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Altitude ist ein einfaches Flugzeug-Kampfspiel in 2D, das wirklich jeder mal testen sollte. Es macht einfach Spaß, sich gegen andere Spieler in 2D-Kampfszenarien zu stellen. Manchmal ist es zu schwer, gegen andere Spieler zu spielen, aber für den Notfall gibt es noch einen Offline-Modus (Skirimish).

Also, was lest ihr denn noch weiter? Hör auf damit und fang' an zu spielen! :)

[i]Wenn dir dieses Review gefallen/geholfen hat und du mehr Reviews von mir sehen möchtest, dann kannst du dir hier [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/nickifr/recommended/]weitere Reviews von mir[/url] ansehen![/i]

review: OK, so my expectations were really low when I downloaded the game because the game didn't look very fun from the screenshots... But I gave it a try anyway... And am I happy I did it? Hell yes! I found an amazing airplane soccer game! Like, really... There the "Kill everybody" and the "Destroy enemy's base" missions, but the "Plane Ball" is defenetly the funniest of all! Online, it's kinda hard 'cuz there isn't any teamwork at all... But playing with 19 AI is just the complete mayhem!

review:
(CRÍTICA)
Me generó mucha bronca haberlo pagado al juego cuando estaba en venta y luego un año más tarde que lo terminen poniendo gratuito. Simplemente eso.
(RECOMENDACIÓN)
El juego está bueno, es multiplataforma y pesa 200mb. Los Forros lo hicieron "Free to Play" pero es bastánte cómico en el sentido de cómo planeás los avioncitos y las diferentes formas de matar y morir en el juego (aparte de los diferentes modos de juego que encontrás en los servers).

review: 这款游戏作为免费游戏来说质量还是蛮不错的，非常适合无聊的时候打发时间，就是联机什么的不太方便，几乎都是外国的服务器，ping太高了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198069703871', 'num_games_owned': 448, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1421832503}
review:
W grze wcielamy się w postać kierowcę samolotu, a raczej w samolot.
Na początku mamy samouczek, który przygotowuje nas do pełnej gry multiplayer, do zmierzenia się z innymi graczami.
W Altitude możemy spotkać się z kilkoma trybami gry, między innymi:
Każdy na Każdego, czyli tryb, w którym osoba, która zniszczy jak największą liczbę samolotów w ciągu pięciu minut wygrywa
Piłka, w której są 2 drużyny. Ich celem jest trafienie piłką do bramki przeciwnika. Coś jak piłka nożna, ale owiele trudniejsze. 
Jest też 3 tryb (nie pamiętam nazwy) w, którym naszym zadaniem jest zniszczenie maszyny, która znajduje się w bazie obu drużyn, aby to zrobić musimy spuścić na nią bombę, a jest to nie lada wyzwanie gdyż maszyn bronią działka strażnicze, które najlepiej zniszczyć !
W grze możemy odblokowywać także różne rodzaje samolotów i każdy z nich cechuje się czyms innym. Są także rangi i Prestiże, które wydłużają naszą rozgrywkę i zachęcają do dalszej gry. Według mnie w grę, gra się bardzo ze znajomymi. Daję 7/10 i oczywiście Polecam ! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198044565345', 'num_games_owned': 486, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 1515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1109, 'last_played': 1481823790}

author: {'steamid': '76561198009880375', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 8714, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8702, 'last_played': 1682918381}
review:
Altitude is past its prime in server population, but it is easily the best 2D multiplayer combat game I've ever played.

This game knew exactly what it wanted to be and accomplished it beautifully.

The controls are simple. The gameplay is straight forward. The different game modes are interesting.

It's easy for beginners and has a very high skill cap. This is one of the very few games I've ever played where I can stop playing it for a week then jump right back in whenever I want and feel comfortable and relaxed. It's like riding a smooth bike.

When I think about this game, I think of a multiplayer space shooter game I played a long time ago called SubSpace. I feel this is a spiritual successor.

Play this game while you can, before it's gone forever.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045334746', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1545, 'last_played': 1650708437}
review:
Fun et addictif!
Je tiens à préciser que le jeu est VRAIMENT gratuit, et non pay to win (même si je l'ai, à la base, obtenu au temps où il était encore payant :p )
Au premier abord, facile à jouer, mais très difficile à maîtriser.
Chaque avion a sa particularité, et se joue, de ce fait différemment.
Chaque avion peut également être "configuré" au moyen de perks que l'on obtient au fil de la progression de niveau.

La communauté, bien que restreinte, est très sympathique. Je n'ai jamais eu affaire à des rageux, ou des mauvais gagnants. Les anciens donnent volontiers des conseils pour vous permettre de vous améliorer.
A jouer absolument!

author: {'steamid': '76561198074755766', 'num_games_owned': 390, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1527271926}

author: {'steamid': '76561198122493217', 'num_games_owned': 380, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1421769247}
review: Очень интересная и классная игра!Несмотря на то что она так мало весит,и на её простенькую графику,в ней есть 3 режима (каждий сам за себя,разрушение базы и футбол),да-да,футбол.В игре присутствует мультиплеер и множество красочных карт,причём если карты не по вашему вкусу,для вас есть редактор карт. Помимо мультиплеера вы можете играть с ботами и проходить мисии. В игре очень много типов самолетов от медленного бомбордировщика до быстрого истребителя. Очень рекомендую вам эту игру! 100 из 10 :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198048021629', 'num_games_owned': 801, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 407, 'last_played': 1357977600}
review: Как только открыл эту игру, начал бесконечно умирать в мультиплеере. Поначалу я просто не понимал, что нужно делать, что делать не нужно, но позже, разобравшись... Эта игра вытеснила все другие, я начал играть в неё по-многу, оттачивая искусство :D Поскольку по 1к часов в эту игру наигрывают единицы, которых можно приписать к числу фанатиков, можно говорить о том, что это не задротскийпседодвадешныйммоскучейвсякихвкусняшекипрч, что очень радует. Предыдущим я хотел сказать о том, что вы не потратите на эту игру более 40 часов. 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198062731069', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1417234799}
review:
>stroll into my local GameStop
>looking to pick up a copy of Altitude
>grab the game and take it to the charming maiden at the register
>"Pardon me, milady...but could you ring me up? A shame I don't have your number or I'd ring you up instead..."
>she giggles and takes the game, blushing as her fingers brush mine due to my fingerless gloves
>her eyes widen as she reads the game's title
>"Wow, I've never seen anyone buy this before! You must have special taste!"
>I smile and ready a witty response when suddenly a voice rings out from behind
>"Hahaha look at what this ♥♥♥♥♥♥ is buying! That's not Call of Duty Advanced Memefare! What a piece of ♥♥♥♥!"
>I quickly turn around, my cloak billowing behind me, to discern the source of the rude outburst
>generic dudebro caricature with a sports team cap and "the guy that beat you up that one time behind the school in early October" shirt is standing there guffawing
>"Excuse me sir...you may disparage my person if you wish, but it is untoward to swear in front of a lady."
>"♥♥♥♥ you ♥♥♥♥♥♥!"
>I smile quietly and tip my fedora low across my eyes, concealing them
>"As you wish..."
>I quickly swing my cane into his kneecap before he can react
>he bellows and charges forward
>I expertly sidestep him and the cashier screams as he crashes into the counter
>I draw my sword-cane and mutter a quiet oath as I drive it deep into his back
>"...requiescat in pace..."
>As I clean my blade the girl walks out from behind the counter, twirling her hair with her fingers
>"So...maybe you'd like to come over to my place to play that game sometime...?
>"No thanks, milady,besides..."
>I sheath my sword
>"You're not my type."
>skate away on my Heelys

author: {'steamid': '76561197963474015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 98347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13880, 'last_played': 1668825431}
review: I play this quite often. I'm a "pub" player. It's rare that anyone is trolling or causing trouble. Possibly it's the servers that I play on. My general experience with this game is good. I see a lot of the same people and play with them often. I don't *know* these people, but I feel like I know them on some level through our gameplay. I'm always willing to help new players out if they would like. This, for me, is the most rewarding game in my library.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069384055', 'num_games_owned': 720, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 478, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1515990471}
review: This is the most underrated multiplayer game available, bar none. Seriously, I invite you to leave a comment telling me of an even less-known game that's as good as Altitude. It's a crazy, fast-paced arcade shooter where little cartoon planes mercilessly eliminate one another with the help of biological weaponry. Do you want to play football in the mines of Moria, with all the players as magic teleporting spaceships? Of course you do. Download this (tiny) download. Play it. It's free. What is there to lose?

author: {'steamid': '76561197965827217', 'num_games_owned': 370, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 68013, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31083, 'last_played': 1659106417}
review:
One of the best underrated multiplayer games. And it's ultra low spec.
Best part of this is the football. You got football played with planes and you can't underestimate how good that is. 
5 different planes add some good depth to it. 
If you're a beginner- it's worth finding a football server with bots, and learning how to pass and all that. Also there's a good fun tutorial prepared by altitude. 
Most common server is 14 people, and sometimes the skill level can be quite high. In which case be maybe a bit prepared for some grumpy players especially if you don't know which direction you're going, don't know how to pass, and go for enormous kill counts and neglecting the ball. 
Otherwise, enjoy one of the most underrated multiplayer games on the internet, and which is free as well.

review: Multiplayer mayhem with airplanes.  Play soccer, deathmatch, team deathmatch, base destruction and more.  Nice 2D art graphics that compliment the not so serious yet somewhat serious overtone of the game.  This game just became free to play not too long ago.  Great fun with decent casual physics which makes flying and killing that much more skillful.  I had lots of fun when I played this and highly recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016686103', 'num_games_owned': 180, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1416641594}
review:
It's free, small download, 'worth a try'.
Thats about the only rating I'll give this game: "its worth a try"...
until you realise the substantial power creep...
that level 60? (max level?) he's gonna have a gun that one shots you (even with armor upgrade on, if you even make it that far)...in a plane thats faster than yours, more durable than yours, and much more agile than yours.
If the game had any balance whatsoever it would be fun for more than it was, but now with the realization of grind, i can suck it up and throw 10-20 hours into this game at a disadvantage until i unlock everything, or i can give up on it.
Quite an obvious choice once you realise what ridiculously good games are out there, and still completely free...
Back to war thunder......and warframe :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198058731543', 'num_games_owned': 3806, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 1128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1118, 'last_played': 1681058628}
review:
[b] Altitude - бесплатная мультиплеерная 2D-аркада со сражениями на самолётах. [/b]

[h1] 🎤 Вступление [/h1]

Весьма скромный инди-проект от двух разработчиков, которые на удивление, продолжают поддерживать игру, даже спустя такой долгий период после выхода и при фактическом отсутствии игроков на серверах.

[h1] 🎮 Геймплей [/h1]

Altitude - это мультиплеерные сражения на 2D-аренах с участием боевых самолётов с установленным на них оружием.

В игре доступно несколько режимов: классический дезматч, командный дезматч, уничтожение вражеской базы, и футбол. Пожалуй самым интересным получился именно последний, так как кроме уничтожения врагов, здесь нужно ещё закидывать мяч в ворота, стараясь уклонятся от атак противников, а в случае потери мяча, пытаться его отобрать. Также неплохим получился режим с нападением и защитой базы, где одному из игроков дают бомбу, которую нужно скинуть в определенную уязвимую точку. Дополнительным усложняющим фактором здесь являются турели, от огня которых, необходимо своевременно уворачиваться. Все режимы можно запустить как в мультиплеере, так и в одиночной игре. При отсутствии игроков в онлайн сессиях, свободные места заполняются ботами, поэтому сидеть в лобби с длительным ожиданием людей не придётся.

У каждого самолёта есть три базовых показателя. Скорость - можно как ускорять самолёт, так и замедлять, однако если он полностью остановится, то двигатель заглохнет и ваше воздушное судно начнет падать. Энергия - ресурс, который тратиться во время использования оружия и ускорения. Этот показатель довольно быстро восстанавливается, но всё же, создаёт определенные ограничения во время ведения огня и использования ускоренного режима полёта. Полоска здоровья - она отвечает за то, в каком состоянии находится самолёт. Все вышеперечисленные элементы, плюс, особенность физической модели, создают определенные сложности во время воздушных сражений и заставляют следовать определённому тактическому принципу: правильно рассчитывать время атак и знать особенности каждого самолёта с его текущим боевым арсеналом.

На выбор доступно пять видов самолётов, каждый из которых обладает своими характеристиками и набором определённого оружия. Самолёты довольно сильно отличаются друг от друга, как внешне, так и технически и для каждого из них необходима своя тактика управления. Одни более маневренны, но имеют слабую поражающую способность, другие медленные и неповоротливые, но имеют в своём арсенале более разрушительное оружие. Само оружие представлено в основном пулеметами, гранатомётами, минами и электрическими пушками.

За победы и уничтожения противников начисляются очки роста, которые повышают уровень, и открывают улучшения для самолётов. Система улучшений здесь получилась однообразной и состоит из одинаковых апгрейдов для всех видов летательных аппаратов: усовершенствование базового оружия, установка временного поля защиты, электрическая ловушка или самонаводящаяся ракета.

 [h1] 🚧 Остальное [/h1]

Визуально Altitude выглядит очень просто. Здесь можно провести аналогию с флеш играми. Сама картинка яркая и красочная, мне даже чем-то напомнило стиль серии Worms. Уровни состоят преимущественно из фоновой плоской картинки и нескольких крупных объектов блоков, об которые можно разбиться во время полётов. Недостатком геймдизайна, как по мне, является то, что в боях с большим количеством самолётиков в кадре, всё превращается в какую-то мешанину из взрывов.

Безусловно разработчиков нужно похвалить за длительную поддержку и оснащение игры базой необходимых инструментов. Периодически выходят фикс апдейты, до сих пор есть официальные рабочие сервера. В файлах игры доступна инструкция и все необходимые приложения для запуска своего собственного сервера. Есть ряд инструментов для создания карт и уровней. Также игра будучи платной, со временем перешла в статус бесплатной.

И всё же несмотря на неплохую проработку воздушных сражений на мини-самолетиках, игра выглядит слишком просто, а геймплей довольно быстро приедается. К этому, также стоит отнести и то, что в игре, крайне редко можно встретить живых людей и свой мультиплеерный потенциал Altitude давно потерял.

[h1] 🏁 Итог:

В целом, неплохая реализация аркадных, казуальных, воздушных сражений на самолётах, но с банальной прокачкой оружия, достаточно быстро приедающимся игровым процессом, неброским внешним видом и отсутствием игроков на серверах. [/h1]

review:
Recomendo este Game,com uma interface fácil e interativa, o Altitude é um jogo com toques infantis e ao mesmo tempo adultos; como pode ser visto nos áviões que tem toques 'infantis', como se fossem brinquedos e as explosões que são mais estilo "Woms".
  Caso você queira ter interação, amigos,disputas e tudo isso sem ver "Sangue" e destruição,esse jogo é recomendável à você, recomendado para todos as idades, ele tem modos de game diferentes, tendo estilo futebol, ataque a torre , time vs time e todo mundo vs todo mundo, os desenvolvedores estão de parabéns.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134994514', 'num_games_owned': 289, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1414588653}
review:
A játék már nem mai darab, ezt be kell vallanom. Elmékszem, kiskoromban imádtam a demóval játszani, és most már a teljes játék is ingyenes! :) Ha valaki játszani akar vele:
Pro:
+Nagyon szórakoztató darab
+Új repülők nyerhetők a szintlépésekkel...
+...amikhez új skineket is vehetsz a Multiplayer Pontjaid felhasználásával! (Így igaz, nincsenek mikrotranzakciók igazi pénzzel!)
+Kicsi a mérete (Pár szász MB)

Kontra:
-A multiplayer pontok már nem szerezhetők meg, mivel a készítők már nem "adnak" (Alapból kapsz 300-at. Abból kijön 3 skin... Jó szórakozást...)

review:
Altitude is not a complicated game
Altitude does not have sophisticated graphics
Altitude does not have a story
Altitude does not contain fancy explosions.
 
Altitude is fast paced and highly addictive
Altitude has a number of planes with a number of flight styles 
Altitude has a number of unlockable customizations that can be applied to any plane
Altitude has a good number of active servers and players
Altitude is FUN

author: {'steamid': '76561198012403435', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 1284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1284, 'last_played': 1388346603}
review:
If you like small short time 2D games, this is the right choice for you:

Being in a comic like 2D world, that reminds a little bit of worms, you control one of five fighter planes with each different playstyle and abilitys.
Armed with MGs, Rockets, Lasers and Bombs, you have to shoot down the enemys and survive as long as you can.
The game gives you a leveling system, achievments and with that the ability to customize your choose of abilitys you use.
Ingame you not only fly an shoot but have basic physical elements like altitude, speed and afterburner. If you get to slow while flying up, your engine will stall and you will fall from the sky. Also you can find one use weapons on the map, that will give you rockets, EMP fields and shields.

The game has a lot of game modes like Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, last man standing and some form of capture the ball mode.

Even if it hasnt that big community anymore it still has usable full functional bots, which arent that big challenge, but still decent and dangerous.

Being able to be played with only the mouse, it is a nice game on mobile devices and a short game for long traveling.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056636404', 'num_games_owned': 596, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1412979471}
review:
This game is free. It can run on a toaster. 

But if you need more reasons to get this game I'll give them to you. It's an acrady plane shooter. You can stall your plain in mid air fall back to the bottom of the map to trick your opponent and shoot em' down. You can play a base deffence game mode or a football (soccer) mode. It's fun fast and requires some skill.

The community is still active! Don't fear. And you can help by playing, again it's free. You have no reason not to try it!

review: Altitude no es "otro" juego de avioncitos, es más que eso. El juego nos ofrece varios modos de juegos dónde el más divertido es el de ball(futbol). Divierte lo justo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098102848', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 697, 'last_played': 1436451166}
review:
Altitude is a neat game I found out went free recently. its a 2D arcade shooter, where you pilot your choice of plane in a variety of game modes. There are death match and team death match game modes like you would expect from a shooter, but you also get "ball" modes that involve getting the ball through the goal, and bomb the base game modes. 

Altitude comes with a map editor that you can use, and the game can be played single player or multiplayer. I have noticed that it seems to have a decent amount of players most of the day as of me writing this review. So you should not have much trouble trying to find a game for a while (as of 9/13/14). I would recommend this game to any of my friends looking for a free to play multiplayer game, its pretty neat but you will probably like it more if you are a fan of indie games or pilot games. Altitude is free now on Steam, so you should try it if you think it may interest you.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961848810', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1585435100}

author: {'steamid': '76561197993375686', 'num_games_owned': 550, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2818, 'last_played': 1402140904}
review:
It's not just a plane simulator.

Most of the modes are focused on team play.
The most popular ones are: football simulation and destroy enemy's base.

You are starting with the simplest plane and after few hours of playing (once you will have higher level) you will be able to pick up some more fancy planes. You can change your wepons types to make you more powerful.

It's a pretty simple game but I think that it's really worth it's price. Check it out!

author: {'steamid': '76561198014845898', 'num_games_owned': 484, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 704, 'last_played': 1410296749}
review:
Altitude es un juego con un planteamiento muy sencillo pero que rápidamente te atrapa y al que le puedes dedicar muchas horas sin darte cuenta. Al empezar hay un pequeño tutorial pero el juego es completamente online. Hay varios modos pero mi preferido es el de fútbol en el que deberemos anotar con un balón en la portería enemiga.

Como todo juego online, al principio puede desanimar sobretodo si coincides en una partida de pro's, pero hay muchos servidores para iniciados. En poco tiempo se le coge el truco y te picas para subir de nivel y desbloquear todas las aeronaves.

Encima ahora es gratuíto así que lo recomiendo encarecidamente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073467426', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1419285302}
review:
Molto consigliato, Fantastico gioco è completamente gratis e non esistono i PayToWin, Pertanto per sbloccare Vari Aerei e potenziamenti, dovrete soltanto salire di livello e distruggere più aerei nemici possibili.

Cose negative di questo gioco c'è ne soltato una Quasi tutti i server hanno 100 di ping o molto di più.
Per il resto è fantastico, Grafica molto originale e soprattuto molto leggera

author: {'steamid': '76561198045381877', 'num_games_owned': 557, 'num_reviews': 2586, 'playtime_forever': 1335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 395, 'last_played': 1499561048}
review:
Altitude is a neat game I found out went free recently. its a 2D arcade shooter, where you pilot your choice of plane in a variety of game modes.  There are death match and team death match game modes like you would expect from a shooter, but you also get "ball" modes that involve getting the ball through the goal, and bomb the base game modes. 

Altitude comes with a map editor that you can use, and the game can be played single player or multiplayer. I have noticed that it seems to have a decent amount of players most of the day as of me writing this review. So you should not have much trouble trying to find a game for a while (as of 9/13/14).  I would recommend this game to any of my friends looking for a free to play multiplayer game, its pretty neat but you will probably like it more if you are a fan of indie games or pilot games. Altitude is free now on Steam, so you should try it if you think it may interest you.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993566705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1429843505}
review:
It's a shame that more sports aren't played in mid-air.  I think there will be fewer and fewer of them ever since that tragic accident in reno that killed more people than I care to think about.

But for a 2d flight combat game, this little diversion knows what it's doing. The mode most worth playing is the game with a ball, though it's been way too long since I've played the game for me to remember what the mode is called. It's like soccer, only in the air and without flopping.

And the U.S. probably wins more often, which makes any sport better.

Anyhow, well-made game that I enjoyed. And then stopped playing. But remembered enjoying enough to write a review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059494830', 'num_games_owned': 676, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1410282804}
review:
ВЕРНУЛА МНЕ МОЙ 2007!!!!11 
Эта игра наполнила мне  BT Biplanes , та же механика . - вид сбоку .
Есть пять(вроде)  видов самолетов - от тяжелых с ракетами и медленных до быстрых с пулемётом . Также у каждого самолета есть кроме разных основных атак УЛЬТА (да, мой юный дотер) . например , кинуть летающую мину , пустить ракету или супер очередь из пулемёта .
Управление - мышкой .
Также порадовали режимы -
1 . есть некий аналог ДОТКИ (лол) - две базы , турели , а дальше не расскажу , сам попробуй . 
2. Два вида ФУТБОЛА. берем мяч и доносим его до ворот врага, кидая. Враги должны вас убить чтобы отобрать мяч, также можно пасовать.
3. Просто ДЕДматч .
4. 20киллов - первый убивший 20 чел выигрывает .

А еще игра теперь бесплатна - в общем , 8\10 - в это стоит поиграть , но графика очень детская .
ВСЕМ БИПЛАНОВ .
онлайн мелкий , но думаю фри версия игры это исправит.

review:
Я бы не стал называть эту игру инди, идея не нова, да и вполне типична. (на 2009 год)
Но это не значит, что игра плоха, отнюдь. Крайне рекомендую всем. 
Игра позволит расслабиться от задротских онлайн баталий и просто провести часок другой, весело играя в футболл на самолётах. .)

review:
O jogo parece ser aqueles chato e ruim né ?
Mas não é, eu gostei do jogo e é daqueles de voar com o mouse(ou com o teclado) e atirar nos inimigos, e subindo de level para desbloquear novos "poderes" e "habilidades" o jogo fica melhor com um amigo para disputar ou te ajudar! <3
Jogo divertido nota 9,5/10
[spoiler] Dei nota 9,5 porque, deveria dar uma balanceada nos inimigos(você de level 15 e o inimigo de level 50) [/spoiler]

review: This game is free, its a decent way to waste some time without actually needing to pay anything. I'd reccomend it if you have nothing else to do, cuz why not, it's free!

author: {'steamid': '76561197989550177', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 59824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60035, 'last_played': 1635360930}
review:
Bueno que voy a decir del juego al que más horas he dedicado en Steam. Si te gustan los juegos adictivos, que sirven tanto para rellenar un hueco de media hora de vicio, como para tirarte una tarde entera con él, hazte con una copia de Altitude en cuanto lo veas rebajado (suele estar a 2,5€ en los periodos de ofertas y a mi gusto debería tener un precio de 5€ en lugar de 10€ en los periodos sin rebaja).

Se trata de un juego multiplayer online en el que manejas un avión en planos 2D, las partidas suelen ser de unos 12-14 jugadores en diferentes modos de juego, se puede jugar solo contra bots pero estarías aprovechando el 10% de la diversión que ofrece.

Visualmente muy atractivo por la estética y colores de los fondos, de todas las paredes y obstaculos de cada mapa y sobretodo de los aviones. Pero lo que de verdad engancha es un estilo de juego muy arcade y de un engañoso sencillo manejo, pues aunque es facil hacerse con los mandos de cada uno de los 5 aviones que hay disponibles en el juego, cuesta  acostumbrarse al estilo de juego de cada uno de ellos, desde los más fáciles como el Loopy o el Bomber, hasta los más complicados: el Explodet y el Miranda. 

Hay diferentes modos de juego en los que siempre hay algo en común: destrozar los aviones rivales. Tenemos modos por equipos puramente de lucha aérea al estilo Quake (matar, morir, revivir a los pocos segundos, y volver a matar) o estilo Counter Strike (por rondas, en las que si mueres no vuelves a revivir hasta la siguiente tras uno de los equipos haberla ganado). En todos los mapas tenemos algunos objetos que se van generando cada cierto tiempo en unos puntos colocados en cada mapa, que sirven para darnos una ayuda tanto para destruir otros aviones (misil teledirigido), como para reparar los daños del nuestro (cura completa) o esquivar todos los ataques durante unos segundos (escudo).

Pero tambien hay otros tipos de juego en los que además de como siempre tener la posibilidad matar a los rivales, para puntuar hay que hacer otras cosas, como por ejemplo el Ball, donde hay un nuevo objeto, una bola, en el que el objetivo es transportarla hacia la portería rival, ya sea marcandose una jugada individual esquivando los ataques rivales, o pasandosela a tus compañeros de equipo para ir avanzando, mientras vas jugando con el diseño del mapa repleto de obstaculos. 
U otro modo en el que cada equipo tiene en un extremo del mapa una base que hay que defender y transportar una bomba que se genera en tu zona cada cierto tiempo, hasta la base rival arrojándola sobre ella que irá sufriendo daños con cada impacto dependiendo del acierto del lanzamiento hasta que sea destruida. 
La mayoría de modos son por equipos aunque por supuesto tambien tenemos un Todos contra Todos hasta llegar a X muertes, o hasta que se acabe el tiempo. Tambien hay algunos mapas creados por la gente que son estilo cooperativo de ir superando obstaculos en un laberinto de mapa.

Y en cuanto los aviones el medio con el que vamos a intentar ganar en todos los modos de juego, al principio solo tenemos disponible uno de ellos y conforme conseguimos experiencia al matar, ayudando a matar, marcando goles, destruyendo bases... iremos subiendo de nivel y obteniendo los otros 4 aviones, y después 2 modificaciones para las armas de cada uno de los 5 aviones para tener un total de 15 armas diferentes, y tambien otras mejoras para los aviones como por ejemplo una mayor capacidad de giro, o un blindaje más resistente o mayor recuperacion de la energía que necesitamos para ir disparando nuestras armas o acelerando el avión, hay 2 tipos de mejoras y 4 mejoras de cada tipo que son comunes a todos los aviones. 
Así que solo tenemos que elegir un tipo de avión, ponerle un arma, una mejora azul y otra verde (que son los dos tipos de mejoras que hay) y lanzarlo a la batalla.

En definitiva, un sencillo juego arcade muy divertido y muy adictivo, en el que nada más acabar una partida querrás otra, con una gran variedad de modos de juego y de mapas diferentes y 5 aviones que iremos modificando conforme subamos de nivel. 

Si lo veis de oferta no lo dudéis y haceros con él. Dentro de su género es un 10/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985881367', 'num_games_owned': 651, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 1633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1551, 'last_played': 1707602454}
review:
A few years ago I had a lot of fun with this game.  Not sure if it's still alive/active or whatever and I can't exactly find out since my account is just, I don't know, gone?  It's weird.

It was really fun, though.  Like a lot of games that have an overall account level, though, it wasn't the most balanced.  Later upgrades and planes were just, you know, objectively better than starting things.  The ships aren't necessarily rock-paper-scissors in design but there are elements like that to them.  Having said that, the starting ship is probably the best one, which is good for beginners.

Regardless, the ships were balanced enough that you could play whatever and probably be fine in most situations.  The game modes were varied enough.  You had death match and team death match, yeah, but there was also a mode where you destroyed an enemy base, and another where you effectively played soccor with the space ships.  I really liked the last one, but they were all fun and I'd play whatever when I did.

Controls were fine, graphics were fine, sounds were fine.  The only problem I ever encountered were some latency issues, where people would just appear to teleport somewhere else or where you were clearly disconnecting (everyone was falling or flying into walls).

Yeah, every now and then I boot this up and try to figure out my old account, or to make my old account work, but it never happens.  Had a lot of good times and I would totally play some more, if not a lot, should I ever fix that.  Good game, if you see it on sale, do check it out.  Assuming it's still alive.  It might not be!

The edit: game is mostly dead except for old elitists, apparently.  Shame.  Guess they are a pretty closed off community and not friendly to newbs.  Oh well.  RIP altitude.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967212199', 'num_games_owned': 2525, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1404255226}
review:
Altitude is an online multiplayer dogfighting arcade game. You control cartoonish planes in various gametypes, which feature the standards you've come to expect: deathmatch, CTF, etc. There are a few spins on that, like Airball which plays much like a soccer game with shooting.

You start off with a basic plane, and can unlock more through leveling up. You level up by completing objectives in the games, or finishing matches. The gameplay is simple enough to learn, can control with a keyboard or gamepad, and features a tutorial to teach you about all the game typles. The visuals are very cartoonish, which match the arcade playstyle. This is by no means a simulation. The planes do not control realistically at all, so don't expect that.

Since this is a multiplayer game, you will have to rely on other people actually being online playing this game. On the occassions I've tried, there only seems to be one-two populated servers at any given time. You can play offline with bots, but that always takes some of the fun away from a multiplayer game. Plus, the bots don't really play like human opponents anyway.

Because of the lack of community (which frankly can be expected from a game a few years old without a really great hook), I do not recommend buying Altitude at this time. While it is fun enough in short spurts, you'll have to rely on there being available servers, which is not a guarantee at this time. Try it out if you already own it, but the pricetag is too high for newcomers.

Grade: C

author: {'steamid': '76561198037381785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1403394986}
review:
Aparentemente não há muitos brasileiros jogando, assim, o nosso ping fica sempre muito elevado e somos chutados das partidas em menos de 30 segundos. Em suma, você compra um jogo interessante, mas só consegue jogar com bots. 

Como agravante adicional, toda vez que eu abro esse jogo o meu computador fica sobrecarregado, em "câmera lenta", até que após quase um minuto esperando, ele volta ao normal. O mesmo fenômeno se repete toda vez que eu tento abrir o menu de configurações do jogo, o que é extremamente irritante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014502377', 'num_games_owned': 2868, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 1069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1093, 'last_played': 1368082800}
review:
Altitude, like many online multiplayer games, is only as fun as you make it. The game has smooth controls, a well established sense of "physics", and a sufficient variety of maps and game modes to keep things interesting. However, without any campaign, and lacking any singular objective outside the tried and true "Score more points than the other guys" method, it becomes little more than a simple sport to eat up time. Worth playing, but only for a short time. (Unless you just happen to really really like it.)

TL;DR = Should you play it? Sure...I guess. If it's cheap and you have nothing else to do.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987882469', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 86400}
review:
This game ROCKS!  I downloaded and installed the demo for Linux and it was 100% KICKASS!  It downloaded like IMMEDIATELY - the only thing faster was how quickly the ACTION started!  Right out the box was some sort of puzzler (***SPOILER ALERT***) a choose-your-own-adventure style Steam client-styled popup  with what APPEARS to be only a single choice: click the "OK" button or quit the game...  Doesn't sound like much, does it?  I know, right?  That's what I thought too until I read what ELSE was in the box (and what wasn't, gosh!) - only these cryptic words:

"Altitude - Demo is not available on your current platform."

*MIND.  BLOWN.* Why? OBVIOUSLYbecause like, literally RIGHT NEXT to the "DOWNLOAD DEMO" button is a picture of Tux the Penguin (mostly known for how much he urinates inside the house) - next to that is Eve's apple (Original Sin is such a B!TC#, right?  THANKS, Eve... NOT!), and then that folded-up napkin in the wind (does anyone know what that's for?  I have NO IDEA, but I tots LUV it!).  I mean, so you'd think that this game could be played basically anywhere - I mean, probably don't need more than a couple batteries and some lemons to boot this baby up - I mean, it says STEAMPLAY right there too...  So WHAT COULD THIS MEAN?

Anyways - I've been playing the demo for HOURS now on my mean bean machine (otherwise known as Linux, LOL) and I'm still puzzling it out...   Tux logo + unavailble on Lin(T)ux...  I dare not click "OK" when the answer must be so OBVIOUSLY staring me in the face - I mean, there's probably an achievement for a perfect runthrough (I mean, if I click OK i'd be admitting what?  That you shouldn't put pictures of Tux next to things that don't run on Linux?  Uh, DUH! So OBVIOUS, right?)

Anyway - you innocent fools can count on episode 2 of  my review of this demo as soon as I beat the demo in Linux...

BEST GAME EVER!

author: {'steamid': '76561197996745250', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2598, 'last_played': 86400}
review: Altitude is absolutely brilliant. I haven't played it in quite some time, but when it first came out, I was completely addicted. If you're into casual, team-based battle royale-type arena games, give it a go. Don't be turned off just because it's about dogfighting -- it's much more about cleverness, reaction, and strategy than piloting, since it's a 2D game. There honestly isn't anyone I wouldn't recommend this game to. It's crazy fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013132375', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1316761200}
review:
This game seems like it would be really fun if people were playing it.  I played it some a year ago when I first started trying to go through my games in alphabetical order.  

It pretty much requires at least 8 people (4v4) to play, and I managed to play just one game vs 1 other person.  The game fills in bots that are easily out witted.

Kinda sad cause this game seems like it would be awesome.  

It's kinda capture the flag, and you can unlock a lot of different planes.  There's special weapons and a lot of cool details that would make this kind of game on the same level as TF2 for replayability and fun level.

Wish I could play it with a full server.  I think I saw some tablet or facebook game trying to rip it off.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969310000', 'num_games_owned': 578, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2831, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2699, 'last_played': 1638291317}
review:
"Altitude" is a great multiplayer 2D flying game.

All through it is not in it's prime anymore, it is still a lot of fun and you can still find players online. It has a couple different modes, my favorite being the soccer mode.

The price is somewhat high for the age and how many servers are still online, but non the less I would recommend this game.

8.7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198063645384', 'num_games_owned': 451, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2832, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2819, 'last_played': 1527346436}
review:
[h1]"Best football game on Steam".[/h1]

This was the first game I bought on steam, and to this day I think it's one of the best available. 

[h1]Positives: [/h1]

+ Great gameplay. Easy to learn but difficult to master is definitely the right way to describe this game. The gamemodes are extremely fun and diverse too, so if you don't like mindless free-for-all, you can still play other modes like football or 'team base destruction' (I can't rememer the actual name of the mode).

+Good variety of planes. Great as it allows players to play multiple roles. Don't like close range dogfights? play a bomber, etc.

+Good controls for KB&M users

+Steam achievements

+IT'S FREE NOW. GET IT!

[h1]Negatives: [/h1]

-I don't really understand the ship customisation system. I don't think you can get more skins without paying or something. 

-No controller support

[h1]Conclusion: [/h1]

DOWNLOAD IT FOR GOD'S SAKE!!

ps: play as loopy because they are op...

UPDATE: there aren't as many people playing this now, which is annoying since it's now free, but I still think it's a great game

author: {'steamid': '76561198045664898', 'num_games_owned': 482, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1386656449}
review:
Had I been reviewing Altitude four years ago when it first came out (or even in the year or two after its release), I would give it my highest recommendation. Now, however, I can only barely recommend this game.

The game itself is fantastic. It's a 2D, side-view, multiplayer dogfighting game. The controls are tight, the gameplay intense, and the game plays so quickly (rounds last only a few minutes) that it induces "just one more game" syndrome. To keep things from getting too repetitive, there are variety of plane types and boosts that can be earned through an XP system. There are also a number of game types - of particular note is the "ball" game type where players attempt to carry and shoot a ball into the opposing team's goal without being shot down in the process. Scoring the goal is just as exciting as it is in any sports game.

So why can I no longer wholehearted recommend the game? Well, it has encountered the fate that any multiplayer-focused game that isn't as popular as, say Counterstrike, has met: lack of players. There are very few people playing the game now and the few active players left are INSANELY good. Even someone like myself who was half-way decent as a ball runner finds respawning to happen way too frequently.

That leaves two options for enjoying the game: either skirmish against the bots or round up some friends. As with most games of this ilk, playing with and against bots is okay but not a perfect substitute for live players. Perhaps the best way to enjoy the game at this point is to round up a few friends who also own it and host a private game.

Altitude is a great game whose lifespan has run its course. I recommend it for a group of friends or if it goes on Steam sale again (not extremely likely given its age) and creates an influx of new players. Otherwise, I regrettably recommend passing on a game that not enough people enjoyed.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970870886', 'num_games_owned': 917, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 2294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1522, 'last_played': 1686188763}
review:
As someone who runs a private server for a few friends every once in a while (when we feel like playing), Altitude is an easy-to-play, easy-to-setup game that we can jump in and out of very quickly. It's very fun for brief stretches of time, and the server options are customizable to favor both the experienced and the new. 

In a sense, Altitude's multiplayer reminds me of the feeling of old-school FPSes with the openness of maps and hectic gameplay. The flight and speed of the varying ships have a bit of a learning curve, but once you find that ship that's "just right" for you, you'll either feel like a aerial master or a bomber of death. 

The levelling system with perks do lock away some interesting abilities, but for the most part, we haven't seen an issue where the perks themselves overpower players. Thankfully, the only real determining factor is a person's piloting skill. Learn to fly, and you can get into this game without a problem.

Keep gameplay short, as playing it for long stretches of time will wear you down.

4 out of 5 foxes.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993503645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 4578, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3171, 'last_played': 1496867836}
review:
Alttitude CA DECHIRE !
HAHAHAHA, c'est une petite merveille et fonction sur n'importe quelle type de machine (AMD64 3500+ avec une ATI Xpress 200m et 1go de ram un truc d'il y a plus de 8 ans et le tout sous Arch Linux).

Sinon c'est un petit jeu java 2D en PvP avec différents modes de jeu, foot, destruction de base, free4all, match en équipe ... Autant le jeu date de quelques temps, autant on trouve toujours des serveurs. De plus il est Jouable aussi bien à la manette qu'au clavier souris, et le felling des 2 périphériques est aussi bon l'un que l'autre ...

Je conseil à fond, j'aurais aimé que Booster Trooper possède autant de joueurs aujourd'hui (et qu'il tourne sous linux) :p

author: {'steamid': '76561198009392905', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 3546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3035, 'last_played': 1660623751}
review:
A pretty simple, pretty fun 2D online multiplayer shooter. There are about 5 or 6 different airplanes to choose from, each one with different weapons, speeds and customizable perks. There are different modes you can play, like the typical deathmatch or a mode called ball where you try to get the ball into the goal. While the graphics are remniscent of 2D flash games, the graphics look fine and the gameplay is smooth (outside of network lag).

The game has been out for a few years, so the community has most certainly dwindled, but it's also a game that you don't really need a big community to have fun in. You can usually find at least a server or two to join, so I don't think you need to worry about finding a game.

Overall the game is easy to get into, hard to master, and relatively inexpensive. There's also a demo/guest mode, so if you're on the fence, you can give the game a try and see if you like it before you buy it.

Honestly though, all I play on Altitude are the 24/7 football servers.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979987727', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 1288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1193, 'last_played': 1700686995}
review:
This is a very simple little sidescrolling plane team shooter with your basic deathmatch/ctf sort of game modes. I keep hearing it described as "Soldat with planes," which holds up to a point, sure. Anyway, it's a lot of fun! Even if you're playing online with other players! Something about the fun/colorful graphics seems to prevent me from taking it seriously enough to get angry at it. It's very charming, the gameplay holds up very well, and customizing your planes with perks is a nice way to play to your own strengths without really screwing around with the whole game's balance too much. 

Speaking of customizing, you can unlock new skins for your planes by spreading word of Altitude like a self-servient virus. If you are interested in viewing the game's website and also allowing me to make my planes pretty, feel free to click http://altitudegame.com/friend/737015 .

author: {'steamid': '76561197977909889', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1361001600}
review: 2D Aerial combat with bright, cheery airplanes flying at each other in classic head-to-head ways on small artifical maps. The game is simple to get started blasting away, the downside is that you quickly exhaust the core training missions and are thrust into the dark, empty multiplayer world (only 1 server had other people playing).

author: {'steamid': '76561198047985807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1361001600}
review:
Gioco veramente carinissimo! Bisogna pilotare il proprio aereo (ce ne sono diversi sbloccabili e potenziabili) e vincere una partita contro la squadra avversaria oppure in deathmatch. Sono pochissimi i tasti richiesti per l'uso, è utilizzabile il gamepad ed è davvero tutto intuibile e di facile uso.

Veramente divertente, ma presenta delle pecche che ne rovinano molto l'esperienza. La modalità online è completamente buggata, spesso si viene catapultati fuori per eccesso di ping (in realtà è assai ballerino) e il 90% dei server sono vuoti. E poi graficamente non è proprio il massimo, per andare in 16:9 bisogna deformare l'immagine, quindi bisognerà accontentarsi del formato 4:3.

In ogni caso soprattutto per il problema online, non ne consiglio l'acquisto, ma era veramente sfizioso come gioco.

Voto: 4.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198043482785', 'num_games_owned': 647, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 4551, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4168, 'last_played': 1656984414}

author: {'steamid': '76561197993678527', 'num_games_owned': 487, 'num_reviews': 392, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1642424419}
review:
★★☆☆☆ Okay!

[h1]Action[/h1]

This isn't really a game that can be judged from 10-20 hours of gameplay. Some may think it has no depth and those are the people that judge from 10 hours of game play it takes 100 's of hours to begin to understand the depth and sheer perfected balance that the developers have achieved with this game.

Yes, it is a little on the childish side and yes it lacks graphical awe but in the end it is an indie game with an awesome community and great developers mixed with 100 's and 100 's of smooth bug free game play that really is addictive when given the chance. And this game is free now,  how can you go wrong with that?

author: {'steamid': '76561198005044219', 'num_games_owned': 1037, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 749, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 731, 'last_played': 1418053336}
review:

review:
Altitude is really fun & addictive planes-fighting game, especially if you have some friends to play with.

It looks like a flash-game, but it's a very good way for killing the time. You can have loads of fun in this small game.

I'm not a really indie games fan, but I loved this game. It has fun mods, many planes and upgrades, perks.

This game is totally worth it. A must buy if it's on sale.


8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197991066284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1383286912}

author: {'steamid': '76561198032788858', 'num_games_owned': 1105, 'num_reviews': 678, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1344150000}
review:
Игрушечные (может просто маленькие) самолётики устраивают бои между собой. 

Тут вам и дэсматчи (обычные и командные), и уничтожение баз (подбираем бомбы и пытаемся её сбросить на базу врага), и футбол (подбираем мяч и пытаемся закинуть его в ворота противника, оставаясь при этом невредимыми). Однако мне кажется, что в игре мало контента - всего лишь четыре (или пять?) видов самолётов, куцее синглплеерное обучение (где кампания) и слабая музыка. 

Сядь за штурвал Матильды! 7 из 10 :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197962767542', 'num_games_owned': 3167, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 1477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1468, 'last_played': 1502135899}
review:
Altitude est un jeu de plateforme très fun à jouer, surtout entre amis, mais même seul il reste très plaisant. Les maps sont bien faites, et variées. Le jeu est uniquement en 2D, mais ça n'enlève rien à sa qualité.
Les avions sont tous très différents dans leurs formes et dans la maniabilité.
Attention, désormais il ne reste que les aficionados en ligne, qui risque de vous faire perdre de l'altitude très facilement.
Les succès sont tous faisables, aucun buggé. Il vous faudra entre 17 et 20 heures pour tous les avoir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051323728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 987, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 382, 'last_played': 1419201608}
review:
Questo gioco merita 100+ ore di gioco!
5 tipi di aerei, oguno costumizzabile, molti tipi diversi di partite (distruggi la base, team vs. team, calcio a squadre, all vs. all).
I "poteri" si sbloccano avanzando di livello, e fin da subito si partecipa a partite online (la componente off-line è praticamente insesistente).
Perfetto per qualche match casual con gli amici, senza problemi può tenere impegnato per ore!

review: 멀티 플레이용 2D 자유 이동 슈터 게임. 미려한 조작의 묘미가 아주 잘 살아있는 좋은 게임이다. 다양한 게임 모드와 개성있는 기체가 여럿 준비되어 있어, 서버를 찾을 수 있다면 왁자지껄하게 즐길 수 있다. 아쉽게도 한국에서는 원활한 서버를 찾기 힘들기 때문에 추천하기 힘든 게임.

review:
Pretty fun I suppose.  The game is solid, and runs low on computing resources, but the fun seems to come from playing competitively online and there's no one ever playing it.

Not worth ten dollars, more between the one to five dollar range as it's quality is close to that of a nice smart phone game.  I personally got it to teach five year olds how to set up a LAN network, and it's worked wonders in that regard.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970739339', 'num_games_owned': 674, 'num_reviews': 563, 'playtime_forever': 1577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1577, 'last_played': 1331881200}
review: Altitude is a fun little multiplayer scrolling shooter with a surprising degree of tactical depth, and good variety with several different planes, weapons, perks and gametypes, and easy modding means there's never a shortage of new maps. It seems to hobble in terms of it's playerbase, though- there's never many people on and those that are tend to flock to the 24/7 ball_football servers. For the sake of indie gamers and developers everywhere, buy this goddamn game Instead of Call of Battlefield 3: Modern Corporate Cash Cow. And then play it too, while you're at it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993703113', 'num_games_owned': 1591, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1323331200}
review:
Altitude is a fun little side-scrolling arena game that still has a dedicated competitive community today. Think Soldat with planes.

Easy and simple to play, however most servers are level restricted, which means you won't be able to play with your starter planes until you level up and unlock the more advanced ones.

The good news is you can create your own games and play against bots, which achieves the same thing as if you were playing against human opponents.

Unlocks provide new weapons, tools and abilities for your various planes, and usually provide different options, rather than straight 'upgrades'. This means that beginners can easily stand toe-to-toe with hardcore veterens.

Various modes are available, such as a soccer-like team game, and good old deathmatch.

It's not my cup of tea, but one of the better indie releases out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969372390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1312441200}

author: {'steamid': '76561198004594294', 'num_games_owned': 1773, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 3826, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3825, 'last_played': 1577604430}
review:
Buy it!  Altitude is a game I keep coming back to.  The level restrictions are an unnecessary pain, distinguishing yourself from your allies can be difficult and the hoops required to earn skins are ridiculous.  However, the various modes of side-scrolling battles which form the game's core are solid.

Both shooting opponents and performing mode objectives are fun.  Dying causes no permanent damage and respawning is generally quick.  There are multiple servers and the ability to host your own.  Players can hop in and out, bots can fill uneven teams and there's a single player training mode for those who are still too timid.  Play it now!

review:
無料プレイ期間にちょっと試してから購入。
Flashゲーなみに簡単な操作。シンプルな画面。
そんな世界でひたすら敵の飛行機を撃墜し続けるゲームです。超楽しい。
機体ごとに武器や性能も違うので、それぞれ全く異なるプレイスタイルが求められる。
サッカーモード（ボールを相手のゴールに投げ込む）はやめどきが難しいくらい楽しい。

review: A simple, easy-to-learn high flying adventure where anyone can join the fight, no matter how new they are! With a unique selection of planes and even more unique weapons and perks, this game will keep you entertained all day long.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990021386', 'num_games_owned': 752, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 929, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 929, 'last_played': 1332054000}
review:
A fun multiplayer arcade style 2D shooter with airplanes!
The balance is good and all 5 of the unlockable airplanes are very different and varied. There's a couple of different game modes such as free for all deathmatch, team deathmatch, bomb the base and ball. Ball is basicly capture the flag using a ball and goal posts. Bomb the base has you trying to destroy the enemy base that's defended by player controled planes and AI controlled turrets.

It's addictive to play but I'd reccomend it in small doses at a time.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978584706', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 4782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4782, 'last_played': 1325577600}
review:
This game is a blast!

Fun and intense arcade action that you can play with all your steam friends.
Lots of planes to choose from and the gameplay is pretty well balanced.
Plus loads of customizing for for each aircraft.
A pretty active community helps keep the online games rolling well into the night so you're really never stuck looking for a game.
Be sure to pick this one up when it's on sale and send me an invite so I can get you in my crosshairs.

review:

Le doy un 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013520503', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 39610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39421, 'last_played': 1507374103}
review:
Easily the best Indie MP game I've encountered.  Lots of fun.  The team-based multiplayer modes never seem to get old.  A lot of teamwork is required as no two games ever play out the same way.

The controls are flawless.  I found keyboard best, but you can also use a mouse (even one handed) or gamepad.  Very little time is spent in between rounds or in loading screens unlike most mp games.

The game is great for those occasions where you don't have much time so just want to drop in / drop out.  There are always plenty of servers ready to join.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018265822', 'num_games_owned': 2853, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 5871, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5792, 'last_played': 1527325666}
review:
I'm revisiting this review since the game recently went free and received an update.  Even though this game is one of my first ever games on Steam, still to this day I would consider it a favorite.  The combat is very enjoyable, the concept is unique and engaging.  Due to the tools available it has a multitude of gamemodes and maps.  The progression is rewarding and allows you to learn and modify your playstyle as you unlock more options for your planes.

Unfortunately for Altitude the servers are pretty empty even after becoming free, vets of the game will be mixed in with completely new players and can create frustrating matches for both parties.  It runs off dedicated servers so no skill based matchmaking here folks, sorry.

If you didn't have reason enough to play it before, do yourself a favor and play it now that it is free!

edit: rewrote review since game has gone free.

review:
If you want the feel of a WWI dogfight without all the hassle of a flight sim, play this.

Simplified air combat, but just simple enough. It retains all the essentials of aerial combat reduced to a well paced 2D casual shooter. The pacing is fast, but not so fast that you can't think.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999469389', 'num_games_owned': 437, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2714, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2688, 'last_played': 1573358826}
review:
This is a recreation of "biplanes", from many systems ,including the Atari 2600! Fun days. So ok indie devlopers like to  hash some new life into old ideas(space invaders, pong, defender....call of duty :D) The point being they range from fun for a few days to absolute porkipine crap. This game offers no good graphics and the controls are a swine..it is unforgiving. It has that trackmania feel..you know? go as deep as you want for as long as you want? It is AMAZINGLY addictive..this is one of the few efforts to revive a game that would possibly recieve a "PERFECT" award. It has enough new ideas but it has not only held it's game play..now you have  server full of people to fuck you up!

the only downside for me was three play modes. after the novelty wore off..i found myself addicted to the football mode ONLY. good thing is there are fotball decicated servers out there. This game could cost you hours of your life! (%90) - Hard to fault!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007515818', 'num_games_owned': 558, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 86400}
review:
Fun little multiplayer game. Take a look at the screenshots, what you see is what you get. The controls are easy to understand and remember. Definitely one of those games that's easy to learn and takes a while to get good at. One nice perk is that as you play you unlock more planes and abilities. I enjoyed it for a little while but compared to other multiplayer games like TF2 it doesn't hold up. 

7/10

review: Altitude is an incredibly fun and unique game that allows you to control your own customizable aircraft on a 2-D plane (pun intended). Using the power of your mouse, you must guide your aircraft through various obstacles while shooting down enemy planes and, in certain game types, rush to achieve goals in "Aerial Football." Essentially, Altitude is a multiplayer game, but the training mode does offer limited competition against enemy AI. For quick and casual gaming, Altitude is great addition to the Indie franchise!

마우스 하나로도 가볍게 즐길 수 있는 게임.
하지만 사람도 많이 빠져나갔고, 지금은 대부분 고수들만 있어서
지금 사기엔 너무 늦지 않았나 싶음.
게임 자체로는 할만하고 재밌음.
그래도 사람들이야 할만큼은 있고 업데이트도 종종 해서, 
사람을 끌어모을만한 이벤트, 시스템만 있다면 
충분히 '인기'인디 게임이 되지 않을까.

---------

이제 사람도 없음ㅋ

review: One of my favorite multiplayer games on Steam. Fun, fast-paced action with a decent variety of game modes. the Aerial Football is awesome and it has a nice perks system. Too bad it doesn't have a campaign mode. A true forgotten gem, one of those great indie games that were released before indies became all the rage. Now that it's completely free there's no reason for you not to try and it's a great way to introduce people to Steam

author: {'steamid': '76561197972290332', 'num_games_owned': 443, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 966, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 945, 'last_played': 1617628351}

author: {'steamid': '76561197979335082', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 86400}
review: Altitude es un divertido juego de aviación en 2D con scroll lateral. Controlas la dirección guiando el avión con el ratón y disparas con los botones del mouse. Se puede jugar con mando también. Es genial jugar en multijugador intentando llegar a la base contraria y depositando bombas, o anotando "goles"...

author: {'steamid': '76561198002209300', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 24213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20355, 'last_played': 1703898185}
review: Altitude may look like a Saturday-morning cartoon, but it plays like a blend of the best aspects of TF2, MW2, and CS:S. Gameplay snaps from frantic battles between entire teams to one-on-one dogfights won or lost by pilot skill and the subtleties that define each plane class. It also features a perfect difficulty curve, with special servers set aside for newer players, and ladder play for experts, with a range of other ways to play in between. If you haven't already, download the demo and give Altitude a try; I promise you won't regret it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025901072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 4307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4307, 'last_played': 1314428400}
review: Altitude is a beautiful, colorful, and fun gaming world. The basic goal of the game is to fly around and shoot other’s planes down in various gaming modes, from plane football, to straight up plane death match. Its graphic is cutesy so it’s really hard to hate this game. The controller could use a little work, but overall the game is perfectly playable. The game does a good job by separating noobs from pros with its robust plane control game play. A noob with most likely crash and suicide themselves from mistakes all the time, but a pro will almost never crash. Insanely frustrating at first, but with time you will be able to master the flight system and start to dominate other players. Sadly this game has a perk system; as a result the competitive games are extremely unfriendly to noobs. Quick note the practice bots suck.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005278872', 'num_games_owned': 1463, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1506005557}
